00220 /* PHash
00221  * - special purpose hash that keeps all its elements in a single linked list.
00222  * - after construction, this hash is thrown away, and the list remains.
00223  * - removing elements is not possible efficiently.
00224  */
00225 
00226 static int PHashSizes[] = {
00227     1, 3, 5, 11, 17, 37, 67, 131, 257, 521, 1031, 2053, 4099, 8209, 
00228     16411, 32771, 65537, 131101, 262147, 524309, 1048583, 2097169, 
00229     4194319, 8388617, 16777259, 33554467, 67108879, 134217757, 268435459
00230 };
00231 
00232 #define PHASH_hash(ph, item) (((uintptr_t) (item)) % ((unsigned int) (ph)->cursize))
00233 #define PHASH_edge(v1, v2)   ((v1) ^ (v2))
00234 
00235 static PHash *phash_new(PHashLink **list, int sizehint)
00236 {
00237     PHash *ph = (PHash *)MEM_callocN(sizeof(PHash), "PHash");
00238     ph->size = 0;
00239     ph->cursize_id = 0;
00240     ph->list = list;
00241 
00242     while (PHashSizes[ph->cursize_id] < sizehint)
00243         ph->cursize_id++;
00244 
00245     ph->cursize = PHashSizes[ph->cursize_id];
00246     ph->buckets = (PHashLink **)MEM_callocN(ph->cursize * sizeof(*ph->buckets), "PHashBuckets");
00247 
00248     return ph;
00249 }
00250 
00251 static void phash_delete(PHash *ph)
00252 {
00253     MEM_freeN(ph->buckets);
00254     MEM_freeN(ph);
00255 }
00256 
00257 static int phash_size(PHash *ph)
00258 {
00259     return ph->size;
00260 }
00261 
00262 static void phash_insert(PHash *ph, PHashLink *link)
00263 {
00264     int size = ph->cursize;
00265     uintptr_t hash = PHASH_hash(ph, link->key);
00266     PHashLink *lookup = ph->buckets[hash];
00267 
00268     if (lookup == NULL) {
00269         /* insert in front of the list */
00270         ph->buckets[hash] = link;
00271         link->next = *(ph->list);
00272         *(ph->list) = link;
00273     }
00274     else {
00275         /* insert after existing element */
00276         link->next = lookup->next;
00277         lookup->next = link;
00278     }
00279         
00280     ph->size++;
00281 
00282     if (ph->size > (size * 3)) {
00283         PHashLink *next = NULL, *first = *(ph->list);
00284 
00285         ph->cursize = PHashSizes[++ph->cursize_id];
00286         MEM_freeN(ph->buckets);
00287         ph->buckets = (PHashLink **)MEM_callocN(ph->cursize * sizeof(*ph->buckets), "PHashBuckets");
00288         ph->size = 0;
00289         *(ph->list) = NULL;
00290 
00291         for (link = first; link; link = next) {
00292             next = link->next;
00293             phash_insert(ph, link);
00294         }
00295     }
00296 }
00297 
00298 static PHashLink *phash_lookup(PHash *ph, PHashKey key)
00299 {
00300     PHashLink *link;
00301     uintptr_t hash = PHASH_hash(ph, key);
00302 
00303     for (link = ph->buckets[hash]; link; link = link->next)
00304         if (link->key == key)
00305             return link;
00306         else if (PHASH_hash(ph, link->key) != hash)
00307             return NULL;
00308     
00309     return link;
00310 }
00311 
00312 static PHashLink *phash_next(PHash *ph, PHashKey key, PHashLink *link)
00313 {
00314     uintptr_t hash = PHASH_hash(ph, key);
00315 
00316     for (link = link->next; link; link = link->next)
00317         if (link->key == key)
00318             return link;
00319         else if (PHASH_hash(ph, link->key) != hash)
00320             return NULL;
00321     
00322     return link;
00323 }

00327 static float p_vec_angle_cos(float *v1, float *v2, float *v3)
00328 {
00329     float d1[3], d2[3];
00330 
00331     d1[0] = v1[0] - v2[0];
00332     d1[1] = v1[1] - v2[1];
00333     d1[2] = v1[2] - v2[2];
00334 
00335     d2[0] = v3[0] - v2[0];
00336     d2[1] = v3[1] - v2[1];
00337     d2[2] = v3[2] - v2[2];
00338 
00339     normalize_v3(d1);
00340     normalize_v3(d2);
00341 
00342     return d1[0] * d2[0] + d1[1] * d2[1] + d1[2] * d2[2];
00343 }
00344 
00345 static float p_vec_angle(float *v1, float *v2, float *v3)
00346 {
00347     float dot = p_vec_angle_cos(v1, v2, v3);
00348 
00349     if (dot <= -1.0f)
00350         return (float)M_PI;
00351     else if (dot >= 1.0f)
00352         return 0.0f;
00353     else
00354         return (float)acos(dot);
00355 }
00356 
00357 static float p_vec2_angle(float *v1, float *v2, float *v3)
00358 {
00359     float u1[3], u2[3], u3[3];
00360 
00361     u1[0] = v1[0]; u1[1] = v1[1]; u1[2] = 0.0f;
00362     u2[0] = v2[0]; u2[1] = v2[1]; u2[2] = 0.0f;
00363     u3[0] = v3[0]; u3[1] = v3[1]; u3[2] = 0.0f;
00364 
00365     return p_vec_angle(u1, u2, u3);
00366 }
00367 
00368 static void p_triangle_angles(float *v1, float *v2, float *v3, float *a1, float *a2, float *a3)
00369 {
00370     *a1 = p_vec_angle(v3, v1, v2);
00371     *a2 = p_vec_angle(v1, v2, v3);
00372     *a3 = (float)M_PI - *a2 - *a1;
00373 }

00376 {
00377     PEdge *e1 = f->edge, *e2 = e1->next, *e3 = e2->next;
00378     PVert *v1 = e1->vert, *v2 = e2->vert, *v3 = e3->vert;
00379 
00380     p_triangle_angles(v1->co, v2->co, v3->co, a1, a2, a3);

00391 static float p_area_signed(float *v1, float *v2, float *v3)
00392 {
00393     return 0.5f * (((v2[0] - v1[0]) * (v3[1] - v1[1])) -
00394                    ((v3[0] - v1[0]) * (v2[1] - v1[1])));
00395 }
00396 
00397 static float p_face_uv_area_signed(PFace *f)
00398 {
00399     PEdge *e1 = f->edge, *e2 = e1->next, *e3 = e2->next;
00400     PVert *v1 = e1->vert, *v2 = e2->vert, *v3 = e3->vert;
00401 
00402     return 0.5f * (((v2->uv[0] - v1->uv[0]) * (v3->uv[1] - v1->uv[1])) -
00403                    ((v3->uv[0] - v1->uv[0]) * (v2->uv[1] - v1->uv[1])));
00404 }

00406 static float p_edge_length(PEdge *e)
00407 {
00408     PVert *v1 = e->vert, *v2 = e->next->vert;
00409     float d[3];
00410 
00411     d[0] = v2->co[0] - v1->co[0];
00412     d[1] = v2->co[1] - v1->co[1];
00413     d[2] = v2->co[2] - v1->co[2];
00414 
00415     return sqrt(d[0] * d[0] + d[1] * d[1] + d[2] * d[2]);
00416 }
00417 
00418 static float p_edge_uv_length(PEdge *e)
00419 {
00420     PVert *v1 = e->vert, *v2 = e->next->vert;
00421     float d[3];
00422 
00423     d[0] = v2->uv[0] - v1->uv[0];
00424     d[1] = v2->uv[1] - v1->uv[1];
00425 
00426     return sqrt(d[0] * d[0] + d[1] * d[1]);
00427 }

00470 static PBool p_intersect_line_2d_dir(float *v1, float *dir1, float *v2, float *dir2, float *isect)
00471 {
00472     float lmbda, div;
00473 
00474     div = dir2[0] * dir1[1] - dir2[1] * dir1[0];
00475 
00476     if (div == 0.0f)
00477         return P_FALSE;
00478 
00479     lmbda = ((v1[1] - v2[1]) * dir1[0] - (v1[0] - v2[0]) * dir1[1]) / div;
00480     isect[0] = v1[0] + lmbda * dir2[0];
00481     isect[1] = v1[1] + lmbda * dir2[1];
00482 
00483     return P_TRUE;
00484 }
00485

00488 {
00489     float dir1[2], dir2[2];
00490 
00491     dir1[0] = v4[0] - v3[0];
00492     dir1[1] = v4[1] - v3[1];
00493 
00494     dir2[0] = v2[0] - v1[0];
00495     dir2[1] = v2[1] - v1[1];
00496 
00497     if (!p_intersect_line_2d_dir(v1, dir1, v2, dir2, isect)) {
00498         /* parallel - should never happen in theory for polygon kernel, but
00499          * let's give a point nearby in case things go wrong */
00500         isect[0] = (v1[0] + v2[0]) * 0.5f;

00502         return P_FALSE;

00511 static PEdge *p_wheel_edge_next(PEdge *e)
00512 {
00513     return e->next->next->pair;
00514 }
00515 
00516 static PEdge *p_wheel_edge_prev(PEdge *e)
00517 {   
00518     return (e->pair) ? e->pair->next : NULL;
00519 }
00520 
00521 static PEdge *p_boundary_edge_next(PEdge *e)
00522 {
00523     return e->next->vert->edge;

00525 
00526 static PEdge *p_boundary_edge_prev(PEdge *e)
00527 {
00528     PEdge *we = e, *last;
00529 
00530     do {
00531         last = we;
00532         we = p_wheel_edge_next(we);
00533     } while (we && (we != e));
00534 
00535     return last->next->next;
00536 }

00543 static void p_face_flip(PFace *f)
00544 {
00545     PEdge *e1 = f->edge, *e2 = e1->next, *e3 = e2->next;
00546     PVert *v1 = e1->vert, *v2 = e2->vert, *v3 = e3->vert;
00547     int f1 = e1->flag, f2 = e2->flag, f3 = e3->flag;
00548     float *orig_uv1 = e1->orig_uv, *orig_uv2 = e2->orig_uv, *orig_uv3 = e3->orig_uv;
00549 
00550     e1->vert = v2;
00551     e1->next = e3;
00552     e1->orig_uv = orig_uv2;
00553     e1->flag = (f1 & ~PEDGE_VERTEX_FLAGS) | (f2 & PEDGE_VERTEX_FLAGS);
00554 
00555     e2->vert = v3;
00556     e2->next = e1;
00557     e2->orig_uv = orig_uv3;
00558     e2->flag = (f2 & ~PEDGE_VERTEX_FLAGS) | (f3 & PEDGE_VERTEX_FLAGS);
00559 
00560     e3->vert = v1;
00561     e3->next = e2;
00562     e3->orig_uv = orig_uv1;
00563     e3->flag = (f3 & ~PEDGE_VERTEX_FLAGS) | (f1 & PEDGE_VERTEX_FLAGS);
00564 }

00585 /* Loading / Flushing */
00586 
00587 static void p_vert_load_pin_select_uvs(PHandle *handle, PVert *v)
00588 {
00589     PEdge *e;
00590     int nedges = 0, npins = 0;
00591     float pinuv[2];
00592 
00593     v->uv[0] = v->uv[1] = 0.0f;
00594     pinuv[0] = pinuv[1] = 0.0f;
00595     e = v->edge;
00596     do {
00597         if (e->orig_uv) {
00598             if (e->flag & PEDGE_SELECT)
00599                 v->flag |= PVERT_SELECT;
00600 
00601             if (e->flag & PEDGE_PIN) {
00602                 pinuv[0] += e->orig_uv[0] * handle->aspx;
00603                 pinuv[1] += e->orig_uv[1] * handle->aspy;
00604                 npins++;
00605             }
00606             else {
00607                 v->uv[0] += e->orig_uv[0] * handle->aspx;
00608                 v->uv[1] += e->orig_uv[1] * handle->aspy;
00609             }
00610 
00611             nedges++;
00612         }
00613 
00614         e = p_wheel_edge_next(e);
00615     } while (e && e != (v->edge));
00616 
00617     if (npins > 0) {
00618         v->uv[0] = pinuv[0] / npins;
00619         v->uv[1] = pinuv[1] / npins;
00620         v->flag |= PVERT_PIN;
00621     }
00622     else if (nedges > 0) {
00623         v->uv[0] /= nedges;
00624         v->uv[1] /= nedges;
00625     }
00626 }
00627 
00628 static void p_flush_uvs(PHandle *handle, PChart *chart)
00629 {
00630     PEdge *e;
00631 
00632     for (e = chart->edges; e; e = e->nextlink) {
00633         if (e->orig_uv) {
00634             e->orig_uv[0] = e->vert->uv[0] / handle->aspx;
00635             e->orig_uv[1] = e->vert->uv[1] / handle->aspy;
00636         }
00637     }
00638 }
00639 
00640 static void p_flush_uvs_blend(PHandle *handle, PChart *chart, float blend)
00641 {
00642     PEdge *e;
00643     float invblend = 1.0f - blend;
00644 
00645     for (e = chart->edges; e; e = e->nextlink) {
00646         if (e->orig_uv) {
00647             e->orig_uv[0] = blend * e->old_uv[0] + invblend * e->vert->uv[0] / handle->aspx;
00648             e->orig_uv[1] = blend * e->old_uv[1] + invblend * e->vert->uv[1] / handle->aspy;
00649         }
00650     }
00651 }
00652 
00653 static void p_face_backup_uvs(PFace *f)
00654 {
00655     PEdge *e1 = f->edge, *e2 = e1->next, *e3 = e2->next;
00656 
00657     if (e1->orig_uv) {
00658         e1->old_uv[0] = e1->orig_uv[0];
00659         e1->old_uv[1] = e1->orig_uv[1];
00660     }
00661     if (e2->orig_uv) {
00662         e2->old_uv[0] = e2->orig_uv[0];
00663         e2->old_uv[1] = e2->orig_uv[1];
00664     }
00665     if (e3->orig_uv) {
00666         e3->old_uv[0] = e3->orig_uv[0];
00667         e3->old_uv[1] = e3->orig_uv[1];
00668     }
00669 }
00670 
00671 static void p_face_restore_uvs(PFace *f)
00672 {
00673     PEdge *e1 = f->edge, *e2 = e1->next, *e3 = e2->next;
00674 
00675     if (e1->orig_uv) {
00676         e1->orig_uv[0] = e1->old_uv[0];
00677         e1->orig_uv[1] = e1->old_uv[1];
00678     }
00679     if (e2->orig_uv) {
00680         e2->orig_uv[0] = e2->old_uv[0];
00681         e2->orig_uv[1] = e2->old_uv[1];
00682     }
00683     if (e3->orig_uv) {
00684         e3->orig_uv[0] = e3->old_uv[0];
00685         e3->orig_uv[1] = e3->old_uv[1];
00686     }
00687 }
00688 
00689 /* Construction (use only during construction, relies on u.key being set */
00690 
00691 static PVert *p_vert_add(PHandle *handle, PHashKey key, float *co, PEdge *e)
00692 {
00693     PVert *v = (PVert *)BLI_memarena_alloc(handle->arena, sizeof *v);
00694     copy_v3_v3(v->co, co);
00695     v->u.key = key;
00696     v->edge = e;
00697     v->flag = 0;
00698 
00699     phash_insert(handle->hash_verts, (PHashLink *)v);
00700 
00701     return v;
00702 }
00703 
00704 static PVert *p_vert_lookup(PHandle *handle, PHashKey key, float *co, PEdge *e)
00705 {
00706     PVert *v = (PVert *)phash_lookup(handle->hash_verts, key);
00707 
00708     if (v)
00709         return v;
00710     else
00711         return p_vert_add(handle, key, co, e);
00712 }
00713 
00714 static PVert *p_vert_copy(PChart *chart, PVert *v)
00715 {
00716     PVert *nv = (PVert *)BLI_memarena_alloc(chart->handle->arena, sizeof *nv);
00717 
00718     copy_v3_v3(nv->co, v->co);
00719     nv->uv[0] = v->uv[0];
00720     nv->uv[1] = v->uv[1];
00721     nv->u.key = v->u.key;
00722     nv->edge = v->edge;
00723     nv->flag = v->flag;
00724 
00725     return nv;
00726 }
00727 
00728 static PEdge *p_edge_lookup(PHandle *handle, PHashKey *vkeys)
00729 {
00730     PHashKey key = PHASH_edge(vkeys[0], vkeys[1]);
00731     PEdge *e = (PEdge *)phash_lookup(handle->hash_edges, key);
00732 
00733     while (e) {
00734         if ((e->vert->u.key == vkeys[0]) && (e->next->vert->u.key == vkeys[1]))
00735             return e;
00736         else if ((e->vert->u.key == vkeys[1]) && (e->next->vert->u.key == vkeys[0]))
00737             return e;
00738 
00739         e = (PEdge *)phash_next(handle->hash_edges, key, (PHashLink *)e);
00740     }
00741 
00742     return NULL;
00743 }
00744 
00745 static int p_face_exists(ParamHandle *phandle, ParamKey *pvkeys, int i1, int i2, int i3)
00746 {
00747     PHandle *handle = (PHandle *)phandle;
00748     PHashKey *vkeys = (PHashKey *)pvkeys;
00749     PHashKey key = PHASH_edge(vkeys[i1], vkeys[i2]);
00750     PEdge *e = (PEdge *)phash_lookup(handle->hash_edges, key);
00751 
00752     while (e) {
00753         if ((e->vert->u.key == vkeys[i1]) && (e->next->vert->u.key == vkeys[i2])) {
00754             if (e->next->next->vert->u.key == vkeys[i3])
00755                 return P_TRUE;
00756         }
00757         else if ((e->vert->u.key == vkeys[i2]) && (e->next->vert->u.key == vkeys[i1])) {
00758             if (e->next->next->vert->u.key == vkeys[i3])
00759                 return P_TRUE;
00760         }
00761 
00762         e = (PEdge *)phash_next(handle->hash_edges, key, (PHashLink *)e);
00763     }
00764 
00765     return P_FALSE;
00766 }
00767 
00768 static PChart *p_chart_new(PHandle *handle)
00769 {
00770     PChart *chart = (PChart *)MEM_callocN(sizeof *chart, "PChart");
00771     chart->handle = handle;
00772 
00773     return chart;
00774 }
00775 
00776 static void p_chart_delete(PChart *chart)
00777 {
00778     /* the actual links are free by memarena */
00779     MEM_freeN(chart);
00780 }
00781 
00782 static PBool p_edge_implicit_seam(PEdge *e, PEdge *ep)
00783 {
00784     float *uv1, *uv2, *uvp1, *uvp2;
00785     float limit[2];
00786 
00787     limit[0] = 0.00001;
00788     limit[1] = 0.00001;
00789 
00790     uv1 = e->orig_uv;
00791     uv2 = e->next->orig_uv;
00792 
00793     if (e->vert->u.key == ep->vert->u.key) {
00794         uvp1 = ep->orig_uv;
00795         uvp2 = ep->next->orig_uv;
00796     }
00797     else {
00798         uvp1 = ep->next->orig_uv;
00799         uvp2 = ep->orig_uv;
00800     }
00801 
00802     if ((fabsf(uv1[0] - uvp1[0]) > limit[0]) || (fabsf(uv1[1] - uvp1[1]) > limit[1])) {
00803         e->flag |= PEDGE_SEAM;
00804         ep->flag |= PEDGE_SEAM;
00805         return P_TRUE;
00806     }
00807     if ((fabsf(uv2[0] - uvp2[0]) > limit[0]) || (fabsf(uv2[1] - uvp2[1]) > limit[1])) {
00808         e->flag |= PEDGE_SEAM;
00809         ep->flag |= PEDGE_SEAM;
00810         return P_TRUE;
00811     }
00812     
00813     return P_FALSE;
00814 }
00815 
00816 static PBool p_edge_has_pair(PHandle *handle, PEdge *e, PEdge **pair, PBool impl)
00817 {
00818     PHashKey key;
00819     PEdge *pe;
00820     PVert *v1, *v2;
00821     PHashKey key1 = e->vert->u.key;
00822     PHashKey key2 = e->next->vert->u.key;
00823 
00824     if (e->flag & PEDGE_SEAM)
00825         return P_FALSE;
00826     
00827     key = PHASH_edge(key1, key2);
00828     pe = (PEdge *)phash_lookup(handle->hash_edges, key);
00829     *pair = NULL;
00830 
00831     while (pe) {
00832         if (pe != e) {
00833             v1 = pe->vert;
00834             v2 = pe->next->vert;
00835 
00836             if (((v1->u.key == key1) && (v2->u.key == key2)) ||
00837                 ((v1->u.key == key2) && (v2->u.key == key1)))
00838             {
00839 
00840                 /* don't connect seams and t-junctions */
00841                 if ((pe->flag & PEDGE_SEAM) || *pair ||
00842                     (impl && p_edge_implicit_seam(e, pe)))
00843                 {
00844                     *pair = NULL;
00845                     return P_FALSE;
00846                 }
00847 
00848                 *pair = pe;
00849             }
00850         }
00851 
00852         pe = (PEdge *)phash_next(handle->hash_edges, key, (PHashLink *)pe);
00853     }
00854 
00855     if (*pair && (e->vert == (*pair)->vert)) {
00856         if ((*pair)->next->pair || (*pair)->next->next->pair) {
00857             /* non unfoldable, maybe mobius ring or klein bottle */
00858             *pair = NULL;
00859             return P_FALSE;
00860         }
00861     }
00862 
00863     return (*pair != NULL);
00864 }
00865 
00866 static PBool p_edge_connect_pair(PHandle *handle, PEdge *e, PEdge ***stack, PBool impl)
00867 {
00868     PEdge *pair = NULL;
00869 
00870     if (!e->pair && p_edge_has_pair(handle, e, &pair, impl)) {
00871         if (e->vert == pair->vert)
00872             p_face_flip(pair->face);
00873 
00874         e->pair = pair;
00875         pair->pair = e;
00876 
00877         if (!(pair->face->flag & PFACE_CONNECTED)) {
00878             **stack = pair;
00879             (*stack)++;
00880         }
00881     }
00882 
00883     return (e->pair != NULL);
00884 }
00885 
00886 static int p_connect_pairs(PHandle *handle, PBool impl)
00887 {
00888     PEdge **stackbase = MEM_mallocN(sizeof *stackbase * phash_size(handle->hash_faces), "Pstackbase");
00889     PEdge **stack = stackbase;
00890     PFace *f, *first;
00891     PEdge *e, *e1, *e2;
00892     PChart *chart = handle->construction_chart;
00893     int ncharts = 0;
00894 
00895     /* connect pairs, count edges, set vertex-edge pointer to a pairless edge */
00896     for (first = chart->faces; first; first = first->nextlink) {
00897         if (first->flag & PFACE_CONNECTED)
00898             continue;
00899 
00900         *stack = first->edge;
00901         stack++;
00902 
00903         while (stack != stackbase) {
00904             stack--;
00905             e = *stack;
00906             e1 = e->next;
00907             e2 = e1->next;
00908 
00909             f = e->face;
00910             f->flag |= PFACE_CONNECTED;
00911 
00912             /* assign verts to charts so we can sort them later */
00913             f->u.chart = ncharts;
00914 
00915             if (!p_edge_connect_pair(handle, e, &stack, impl))
00916                 e->vert->edge = e;
00917             if (!p_edge_connect_pair(handle, e1, &stack, impl))
00918                 e1->vert->edge = e1;
00919             if (!p_edge_connect_pair(handle, e2, &stack, impl))
00920                 e2->vert->edge = e2;
00921         }
00922 
00923         ncharts++;
00924     }
00925 
00926     MEM_freeN(stackbase);
00927 
00928     return ncharts;
00929 }
00930 
00931 static void p_split_vert(PChart *chart, PEdge *e)
00932 {
00933     PEdge *we, *lastwe = NULL;
00934     PVert *v = e->vert;
00935     PBool copy = P_TRUE;
00936 
00937     if (e->flag & PEDGE_VERTEX_SPLIT)
00938         return;
00939 
00940     /* rewind to start */
00941     lastwe = e;
00942     for (we = p_wheel_edge_prev(e); we && (we != e); we = p_wheel_edge_prev(we))
00943         lastwe = we;
00944     
00945     /* go over all edges in wheel */
00946     for (we = lastwe; we; we = p_wheel_edge_next(we)) {
00947         if (we->flag & PEDGE_VERTEX_SPLIT)
00948             break;
00949 
00950         we->flag |= PEDGE_VERTEX_SPLIT;
00951 
00952         if (we == v->edge) {
00953             /* found it, no need to copy */
00954             copy = P_FALSE;
00955             v->nextlink = chart->verts;
00956             chart->verts = v;
00957             chart->nverts++;
00958         }
00959     }
00960 
00961     if (copy) {
00962         /* not found, copying */
00963         v->flag |= PVERT_SPLIT;
00964         v = p_vert_copy(chart, v);
00965         v->flag |= PVERT_SPLIT;
00966 
00967         v->nextlink = chart->verts;
00968         chart->verts = v;
00969         chart->nverts++;
00970 
00971         v->edge = lastwe;
00972 
00973         we = lastwe;
00974         do {
00975             we->vert = v;
00976             we = p_wheel_edge_next(we);
00977         } while (we && (we != lastwe));
00978     }
00979 }
00980 
00981 static PChart **p_split_charts(PHandle *handle, PChart *chart, int ncharts)
00982 {
00983     PChart **charts = MEM_mallocN(sizeof *charts * ncharts, "PCharts"), *nchart;
00984     PFace *f, *nextf;
00985     int i;
00986 
00987     for (i = 0; i < ncharts; i++)
00988         charts[i] = p_chart_new(handle);
00989 
00990     f = chart->faces;
00991     while (f) {
00992         PEdge *e1 = f->edge, *e2 = e1->next, *e3 = e2->next;
00993         nextf = f->nextlink;
00994 
00995         nchart = charts[f->u.chart];
00996 
00997         f->nextlink = nchart->faces;
00998         nchart->faces = f;
00999         e1->nextlink = nchart->edges;
01000         nchart->edges = e1;
01001         e2->nextlink = nchart->edges;
01002         nchart->edges = e2;
01003         e3->nextlink = nchart->edges;
01004         nchart->edges = e3;
01005 
01006         nchart->nfaces++;
01007         nchart->nedges += 3;
01008 
01009         p_split_vert(nchart, e1);
01010         p_split_vert(nchart, e2);
01011         p_split_vert(nchart, e3);
01012 
01013         f = nextf;
01014     }
01015 
01016     return charts;
01017 }
01018 
01019 static PFace *p_face_add(PHandle *handle)
01020 {
01021     PFace *f;
01022     PEdge *e1, *e2, *e3;
01023 
01024     /* allocate */
01025     f = (PFace *)BLI_memarena_alloc(handle->arena, sizeof *f);
01026     f->flag = 0; // init !
01027 
01028     e1 = (PEdge *)BLI_memarena_alloc(handle->arena, sizeof *e1);
01029     e2 = (PEdge *)BLI_memarena_alloc(handle->arena, sizeof *e2);
01030     e3 = (PEdge *)BLI_memarena_alloc(handle->arena, sizeof *e3);
01031 
01032     /* set up edges */
01033     f->edge = e1;
01034     e1->face = e2->face = e3->face = f;
01035 
01036     e1->next = e2;
01037     e2->next = e3;
01038     e3->next = e1;
01039 
01040     e1->pair = NULL;
01041     e2->pair = NULL;
01042     e3->pair = NULL;
01043    
01044     e1->flag = 0;
01045     e2->flag = 0;
01046     e3->flag = 0;
01047 
01048     return f;
01049 }
01050 
01051 static PFace *p_face_add_construct(PHandle *handle, ParamKey key, ParamKey *vkeys,
01052                                    float *co[3], float *uv[3], int i1, int i2, int i3,
01053                                    ParamBool *pin, ParamBool *select)
01054 {
01055     PFace *f = p_face_add(handle);
01056     PEdge *e1 = f->edge, *e2 = e1->next, *e3 = e2->next;
01057 
01058     e1->vert = p_vert_lookup(handle, vkeys[i1], co[i1], e1);
01059     e2->vert = p_vert_lookup(handle, vkeys[i2], co[i2], e2);
01060     e3->vert = p_vert_lookup(handle, vkeys[i3], co[i3], e3);
01061 
01062     e1->orig_uv = uv[i1];
01063     e2->orig_uv = uv[i2];
01064     e3->orig_uv = uv[i3];
01065 
01066     if (pin) {
01067         if (pin[i1]) e1->flag |= PEDGE_PIN;
01068         if (pin[i2]) e2->flag |= PEDGE_PIN;
01069         if (pin[i3]) e3->flag |= PEDGE_PIN;
01070     }
01071 
01072     if (select) {
01073         if (select[i1]) e1->flag |= PEDGE_SELECT;
01074         if (select[i2]) e2->flag |= PEDGE_SELECT;
01075         if (select[i3]) e3->flag |= PEDGE_SELECT;
01076     }
01077 
01078     /* insert into hash */
01079     f->u.key = key;
01080     phash_insert(handle->hash_faces, (PHashLink *)f);
01081 
01082     e1->u.key = PHASH_edge(vkeys[i1], vkeys[i2]);
01083     e2->u.key = PHASH_edge(vkeys[i2], vkeys[i3]);
01084     e3->u.key = PHASH_edge(vkeys[i3], vkeys[i1]);
01085 
01086     phash_insert(handle->hash_edges, (PHashLink *)e1);
01087     phash_insert(handle->hash_edges, (PHashLink *)e2);
01088     phash_insert(handle->hash_edges, (PHashLink *)e3);
01089 
01090     return f;
01091 }
01092 
01093 static PFace *p_face_add_fill(PChart *chart, PVert *v1, PVert *v2, PVert *v3)
01094 {
01095     PFace *f = p_face_add(chart->handle);
01096     PEdge *e1 = f->edge, *e2 = e1->next, *e3 = e2->next;
01097 
01098     e1->vert = v1;
01099     e2->vert = v2;
01100     e3->vert = v3;
01101 
01102     e1->orig_uv = e2->orig_uv = e3->orig_uv = NULL;
01103 
01104     f->nextlink = chart->faces;
01105     chart->faces = f;
01106     e1->nextlink = chart->edges;
01107     chart->edges = e1;
01108     e2->nextlink = chart->edges;
01109     chart->edges = e2;
01110     e3->nextlink = chart->edges;
01111     chart->edges = e3;
01112 
01113     chart->nfaces++;
01114     chart->nedges += 3;
01115 
01116     return f;
01117 }
01118 
01119 static PBool p_quad_split_direction(PHandle *handle, float **co, PHashKey *vkeys)
01120 {
01121     float fac = len_v3v3(co[0], co[2]) - len_v3v3(co[1], co[3]);
01122     PBool dir = (fac <= 0.0f);
01123 
01124     /* the face exists check is there because of a special case: when
01125      * two quads share three vertices, they can each be split into two
01126      * triangles, resulting in two identical triangles. for example in
01127      * suzanne's nose. */
01128     if (dir) {
01129         if (p_face_exists(handle, vkeys, 0, 1, 2) || p_face_exists(handle, vkeys, 0, 2, 3))
01130             return !dir;
01131     }
01132     else {
01133         if (p_face_exists(handle, vkeys, 0, 1, 3) || p_face_exists(handle, vkeys, 1, 2, 3))
01134             return !dir;
01135     }
01136 
01137     return dir;
01138 }
01139 
01140 /* Construction: boundary filling */
01141 
01142 static void p_chart_boundaries(PChart *chart, int *nboundaries, PEdge **outer)
01143 {   
01144     PEdge *e, *be;
01145     float len, maxlen = -1.0;
01146 
01147     if (nboundaries)
01148         *nboundaries = 0;
01149     if (outer)
01150         *outer = NULL;
01151 
01152     for (e = chart->edges; e; e = e->nextlink) {
01153         if (e->pair || (e->flag & PEDGE_DONE))
01154             continue;
01155 
01156         if (nboundaries)
01157             (*nboundaries)++;
01158 
01159         len = 0.0f;
01160 
01161         be = e;
01162         do {
01163             be->flag |= PEDGE_DONE;
01164             len += p_edge_length(be);
01165             be = be->next->vert->edge;
01166         } while (be != e);
01167 
01168         if (outer && (len > maxlen)) {
01169             *outer = e;
01170             maxlen = len;
01171         }
01172     }
01173 
01174     for (e = chart->edges; e; e = e->nextlink)
01175         e->flag &= ~PEDGE_DONE;
01176 }
01177 
01178 static float p_edge_boundary_angle(PEdge *e)
01179 {
01180     PEdge *we;
01181     PVert *v, *v1, *v2;
01182     float angle;
01183     int n = 0;
01184 
01185     v = e->vert;
01186 
01187     /* concave angle check -- could be better */
01188     angle = M_PI;
01189 
01190     we = v->edge;
01191     do {
01192         v1 = we->next->vert;
01193         v2 = we->next->next->vert;
01194         angle -= p_vec_angle(v1->co, v->co, v2->co);
01195 
01196         we = we->next->next->pair;
01197         n++;
01198     } while (we && (we != v->edge));
01199 
01200     return angle;
01201 }
01202 
01203 static void p_chart_fill_boundary(PChart *chart, PEdge *be, int nedges)
01204 {
01205     PEdge *e, *e1, *e2;
01206 
01207     PFace *f;
01208     struct Heap *heap = BLI_heap_new();
01209     float angle;
01210 
01211     e = be;
01212     do {
01213         angle = p_edge_boundary_angle(e);
01214         e->u.heaplink = BLI_heap_insert(heap, angle, e);
01215 
01216         e = p_boundary_edge_next(e);
01217     } while (e != be);
01218 
01219     if (nedges == 2) {
01220         /* no real boundary, but an isolated seam */
01221         e = be->next->vert->edge;
01222         e->pair = be;
01223         be->pair = e;
01224 
01225         BLI_heap_remove(heap, e->u.heaplink);
01226         BLI_heap_remove(heap, be->u.heaplink);
01227     }
01228     else {
01229         while (nedges > 2) {
01230             PEdge *ne, *ne1, *ne2;
01231 
01232             e = (PEdge *)BLI_heap_popmin(heap);
01233 
01234             e1 = p_boundary_edge_prev(e);
01235             e2 = p_boundary_edge_next(e);
01236 
01237             BLI_heap_remove(heap, e1->u.heaplink);
01238             BLI_heap_remove(heap, e2->u.heaplink);
01239             e->u.heaplink = e1->u.heaplink = e2->u.heaplink = NULL;
01240 
01241             e->flag |= PEDGE_FILLED;
01242             e1->flag |= PEDGE_FILLED;
01243 
01244 
01245 
01246 
01247 
01248             f = p_face_add_fill(chart, e->vert, e1->vert, e2->vert);
01249             f->flag |= PFACE_FILLED;
01250 
01251             ne = f->edge->next->next;
01252             ne1 = f->edge;
01253             ne2 = f->edge->next;
01254 
01255             ne->flag = ne1->flag = ne2->flag = PEDGE_FILLED;
01256 
01257             e->pair = ne;
01258             ne->pair = e;
01259             e1->pair = ne1;
01260             ne1->pair = e1;
01261 
01262             ne->vert = e2->vert;
01263             ne1->vert = e->vert;
01264             ne2->vert = e1->vert;
01265 
01266             if (nedges == 3) {
01267                 e2->pair = ne2;
01268                 ne2->pair = e2;
01269             }
01270             else {
01271                 ne2->vert->edge = ne2;
01272                 
01273                 ne2->u.heaplink = BLI_heap_insert(heap, p_edge_boundary_angle(ne2), ne2);
01274                 e2->u.heaplink = BLI_heap_insert(heap, p_edge_boundary_angle(e2), e2);
01275             }
01276 
01277             nedges--;
01278         }
01279     }
01280 
01281     BLI_heap_free(heap, NULL);
01282 }
01283 
01284 static void p_chart_fill_boundaries(PChart *chart, PEdge *outer)
01285 {
01286     PEdge *e, *be; /* *enext - as yet unused */
01287     int nedges;
01288 
01289     for (e = chart->edges; e; e = e->nextlink) {
01290         /* enext = e->nextlink; - as yet unused */
01291 
01292         if (e->pair || (e->flag & PEDGE_FILLED))
01293             continue;
01294 
01295         nedges = 0;
01296         be = e;
01297         do {
01298             be->flag |= PEDGE_FILLED;
01299             be = be->next->vert->edge;
01300             nedges++;
01301         } while (be != e);
01302 
01303         if (e != outer)
01304             p_chart_fill_boundary(chart, e, nedges);
01305     }
01306 }
01307 
01308 #if 0
01309 /* Polygon kernel for inserting uv's non overlapping */
01310 
01311 static int p_polygon_point_in(float *cp1, float *cp2, float *p)
01312 {
01313     if ((cp1[0] == p[0]) && (cp1[1] == p[1]))
01314         return 2;
01315     else if ((cp2[0] == p[0]) && (cp2[1] == p[1]))
01316         return 3;
01317     else
01318         return (p_area_signed(cp1, cp2, p) >= 0.0f);
01319 }
01320 
01321 static void p_polygon_kernel_clip(float (*oldpoints)[2], int noldpoints, float (*newpoints)[2], int *nnewpoints, float *cp1, float *cp2)
01322 {
01323     float *p2, *p1, isect[2];
01324     int i, p2in, p1in;
01325 
01326     p1 = oldpoints[noldpoints - 1];
01327     p1in = p_polygon_point_in(cp1, cp2, p1);
01328     *nnewpoints = 0;
01329 
01330     for (i = 0; i < noldpoints; i++) {
01331         p2 = oldpoints[i];
01332         p2in = p_polygon_point_in(cp1, cp2, p2);
01333 
01334         if ((p2in >= 2) || (p1in && p2in)) {
01335             newpoints[*nnewpoints][0] = p2[0];
01336             newpoints[*nnewpoints][1] = p2[1];
01337             (*nnewpoints)++;
01338         }
01339         else if (p1in && !p2in) {
01340             if (p1in != 3) {
01341                 p_intersect_line_2d(p1, p2, cp1, cp2, isect);
01342                 newpoints[*nnewpoints][0] = isect[0];
01343                 newpoints[*nnewpoints][1] = isect[1];
01344                 (*nnewpoints)++;
01345             }
01346         }
01347         else if (!p1in && p2in) {
01348             p_intersect_line_2d(p1, p2, cp1, cp2, isect);
01349             newpoints[*nnewpoints][0] = isect[0];
01350             newpoints[*nnewpoints][1] = isect[1];
01351             (*nnewpoints)++;
01352 
01353             newpoints[*nnewpoints][0] = p2[0];
01354             newpoints[*nnewpoints][1] = p2[1];
01355             (*nnewpoints)++;
01356         }
01357         
01358         p1in = p2in;
01359         p1 = p2;
01360     }
01361 }
01362 
01363 static void p_polygon_kernel_center(float (*points)[2], int npoints, float *center)
01364 {
01365     int i, size, nnewpoints = npoints;
01366     float (*oldpoints)[2], (*newpoints)[2], *p1, *p2;
01367     
01368     size = npoints * 3;
01369     oldpoints = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * 2 * size, "PPolygonOldPoints");
01370     newpoints = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * 2 * size, "PPolygonNewPoints");
01371 
01372     memcpy(oldpoints, points, sizeof(float) * 2 * npoints);
01373 
01374     for (i = 0; i < npoints; i++) {
01375         p1 = points[i];
01376         p2 = points[(i + 1) % npoints];
01377         p_polygon_kernel_clip(oldpoints, nnewpoints, newpoints, &nnewpoints, p1, p2);
01378 
01379         if (nnewpoints == 0) {
01380             /* degenerate case, use center of original polygon */
01381             memcpy(oldpoints, points, sizeof(float) * 2 * npoints);
01382             nnewpoints = npoints;
01383             break;
01384         }
01385         else if (nnewpoints == 1) {
01386             /* degenerate case, use remaining point */
01387             center[0] = newpoints[0][0];
01388             center[1] = newpoints[0][1];
01389 
01390             MEM_freeN(oldpoints);
01391             MEM_freeN(newpoints);
01392 
01393             return;
01394         }
01395 
01396         if (nnewpoints * 2 > size) {
01397             size *= 2;
01398             MEM_freeN(oldpoints);
01399             oldpoints = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * 2 * size, "oldpoints");
01400             memcpy(oldpoints, newpoints, sizeof(float) * 2 * nnewpoints);
01401             MEM_freeN(newpoints);
01402             newpoints = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * 2 * size, "newpoints");
01403         }
01404         else {
01405             float (*sw_points)[2] = oldpoints;
01406             oldpoints = newpoints;
01407             newpoints = sw_points;
01408         }
01409     }
01410 
01411     center[0] = center[1] = 0.0f;
01412 
01413     for (i = 0; i < nnewpoints; i++) {
01414         center[0] += oldpoints[i][0];
01415         center[1] += oldpoints[i][1];
01416     }
01417 
01418     center[0] /= nnewpoints;
01419     center[1] /= nnewpoints;
01420 
01421     MEM_freeN(oldpoints);
01422     MEM_freeN(newpoints);
01423 }
01424 #endif
01425 
01426 #if 0
01427 /* Edge Collapser */
01428 
01429 int NCOLLAPSE = 1;
01430 int NCOLLAPSEX = 0;
01431     
01432 static float p_vert_cotan(float *v1, float *v2, float *v3)
01433 {
01434     float a[3], b[3], c[3], clen;
01435 
01436     sub_v3_v3v3(a, v2, v1);
01437     sub_v3_v3v3(b, v3, v1);
01438     cross_v3_v3v3(c, a, b);
01439 
01440     clen = len_v3(c);
01441 
01442     if (clen == 0.0f)
01443         return 0.0f;
01444     
01445     return dot_v3v3(a, b) / clen;
01446 }
01447     
01448 static PBool p_vert_flipped_wheel_triangle(PVert *v)
01449 {
01450     PEdge *e = v->edge;
01451 
01452     do {
01453         if (p_face_uv_area_signed(e->face) < 0.0f)
01454             return P_TRUE;
01455 
01456         e = p_wheel_edge_next(e);
01457     } while (e && (e != v->edge));
01458 
01459     return P_FALSE;
01460 }
01461 
01462 static PBool p_vert_map_harmonic_weights(PVert *v)
01463 {
01464     float weightsum, positionsum[2], olduv[2];
01465 
01466     weightsum = 0.0f;
01467     positionsum[0] = positionsum[1] = 0.0f;
01468 
01469     if (p_vert_interior(v)) {
01470         PEdge *e = v->edge;
01471 
01472         do {
01473             float t1, t2, weight;
01474             PVert *v1, *v2;
01475             
01476             v1 = e->next->vert;
01477             v2 = e->next->next->vert;
01478             t1 = p_vert_cotan(v2->co, e->vert->co, v1->co);
01479 
01480             v1 = e->pair->next->vert;
01481             v2 = e->pair->next->next->vert;
01482             t2 = p_vert_cotan(v2->co, e->pair->vert->co, v1->co);
01483 
01484             weight = 0.5f * (t1 + t2);
01485             weightsum += weight;
01486             positionsum[0] += weight * e->pair->vert->uv[0];
01487             positionsum[1] += weight * e->pair->vert->uv[1];
01488 
01489             e = p_wheel_edge_next(e);
01490         } while (e && (e != v->edge));
01491     }
01492     else {
01493         PEdge *e = v->edge;
01494 
01495         do {
01496             float t1, t2;
01497             PVert *v1, *v2;
01498 
01499             v2 = e->next->vert;
01500             v1 = e->next->next->vert;
01501 
01502             t1 = p_vert_cotan(v1->co, v->co, v2->co);
01503             t2 = p_vert_cotan(v2->co, v->co, v1->co);
01504 
01505             weightsum += t1 + t2;
01506             positionsum[0] += (v2->uv[1] - v1->uv[1]) + (t1 * v2->uv[0] + t2 * v1->uv[0]);
01507             positionsum[1] += (v1->uv[0] - v2->uv[0]) + (t1 * v2->uv[1] + t2 * v1->uv[1]);
01508         
01509             e = p_wheel_edge_next(e);
01510         } while (e && (e != v->edge));
01511     }
01512 
01513     if (weightsum != 0.0f) {
01514         weightsum = 1.0f / weightsum;
01515         positionsum[0] *= weightsum;
01516         positionsum[1] *= weightsum;
01517     }
01518 
01519     olduv[0] = v->uv[0];
01520     olduv[1] = v->uv[1];
01521     v->uv[0] = positionsum[0];
01522     v->uv[1] = positionsum[1];
01523 
01524     if (p_vert_flipped_wheel_triangle(v)) {
01525         v->uv[0] = olduv[0];
01526         v->uv[1] = olduv[1];
01527 
01528         return P_FALSE;
01529     }
01530 
01531     return P_TRUE;
01532 }
01533 
01534 static void p_vert_harmonic_insert(PVert *v)
01535 {
01536     PEdge *e;
01537 
01538     if (!p_vert_map_harmonic_weights(v)) {
01539         /* do polygon kernel center insertion: this is quite slow, but should
01540          * only be needed for 0.01 % of verts or so, when insert with harmonic
01541          * weights fails */
01542 
01543         int npoints = 0, i;
01544         float (*points)[2];
01545 
01546         e = v->edge;
01547         do {
01548             npoints++;  
01549             e = p_wheel_edge_next(e);
01550         } while (e && (e != v->edge));
01551 
01552         if (e == NULL)
01553             npoints++;
01554 
01555         points = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * 2 * npoints, "PHarmonicPoints");
01556 
01557         e = v->edge;
01558         i = 0;
01559         do {
01560             PEdge *nexte = p_wheel_edge_next(e);
01561 
01562             points[i][0] = e->next->vert->uv[0]; 
01563             points[i][1] = e->next->vert->uv[1]; 
01564 
01565             if (nexte == NULL) {
01566                 i++;
01567                 points[i][0] = e->next->next->vert->uv[0]; 
01568                 points[i][1] = e->next->next->vert->uv[1]; 
01569                 break;
01570             }
01571 
01572             e = nexte;
01573             i++;
01574         } while (e != v->edge);
01575         
01576         p_polygon_kernel_center(points, npoints, v->uv);
01577 
01578         MEM_freeN(points);
01579     }
01580 
01581     e = v->edge;
01582     do {
01583         if (!(e->next->vert->flag & PVERT_PIN))
01584             p_vert_map_harmonic_weights(e->next->vert);
01585         e = p_wheel_edge_next(e);
01586     } while (e && (e != v->edge));
01587 
01588     p_vert_map_harmonic_weights(v);
01589 }
01590 
01591 static void p_vert_fix_edge_pointer(PVert *v)
01592 {
01593     PEdge *start = v->edge;
01594 
01595     /* set v->edge pointer to the edge with no pair, if there is one */
01596     while (v->edge->pair) {
01597         v->edge = p_wheel_edge_prev(v->edge);
01598         
01599         if (v->edge == start)
01600             break;
01601     }
01602 }
01603 
01604 static void p_collapsing_verts(PEdge *edge, PEdge *pair, PVert **newv, PVert **keepv)
01605 {
01606     /* the two vertices that are involved in the collapse */
01607     if (edge) {
01608         *newv = edge->vert;
01609         *keepv = edge->next->vert;
01610     }
01611     else {
01612         *newv = pair->next->vert;
01613         *keepv = pair->vert;
01614     }
01615 }
01616 
01617 static void p_collapse_edge(PEdge *edge, PEdge *pair)
01618 {
01619     PVert *oldv, *keepv;
01620     PEdge *e;
01621 
01622     p_collapsing_verts(edge, pair, &oldv, &keepv);
01623 
01624     /* change e->vert pointers from old vertex to the target vertex */
01625     e = oldv->edge;
01626     do {
01627         if ((e != edge) && !(pair && pair->next == e))
01628             e->vert = keepv;
01629 
01630         e = p_wheel_edge_next(e);
01631     } while (e && (e != oldv->edge));
01632 
01633     /* set keepv->edge pointer */
01634     if ((edge && (keepv->edge == edge->next)) || (keepv->edge == pair)) {
01635         if (edge && edge->next->pair)
01636             keepv->edge = edge->next->pair->next;
01637         else if (pair && pair->next->next->pair)
01638             keepv->edge = pair->next->next->pair;
01639         else if (edge && edge->next->next->pair)
01640             keepv->edge = edge->next->next->pair;
01641         else
01642             keepv->edge = pair->next->pair->next;
01643     }
01644     
01645     /* update pairs and v->edge pointers */
01646     if (edge) {
01647         PEdge *e1 = edge->next, *e2 = e1->next;
01648 
01649         if (e1->pair)
01650             e1->pair->pair = e2->pair;
01651 
01652         if (e2->pair) {
01653             e2->pair->pair = e1->pair;
01654             e2->vert->edge = p_wheel_edge_prev(e2);
01655         }
01656         else
01657             e2->vert->edge = p_wheel_edge_next(e2);
01658 
01659         p_vert_fix_edge_pointer(e2->vert);
01660     }
01661 
01662     if (pair) {
01663         PEdge *e1 = pair->next, *e2 = e1->next;
01664 
01665         if (e1->pair)
01666             e1->pair->pair = e2->pair;
01667 
01668         if (e2->pair) {
01669             e2->pair->pair = e1->pair;
01670             e2->vert->edge = p_wheel_edge_prev(e2);
01671         }
01672         else
01673             e2->vert->edge = p_wheel_edge_next(e2);
01674 
01675         p_vert_fix_edge_pointer(e2->vert);
01676     }
01677 
01678     p_vert_fix_edge_pointer(keepv);
01679 
01680     /* mark for move to collapsed list later */
01681     oldv->flag |= PVERT_COLLAPSE;
01682 
01683     if (edge) {
01684         PFace *f = edge->face;
01685         PEdge *e1 = edge->next, *e2 = e1->next;
01686 
01687         f->flag |= PFACE_COLLAPSE;
01688         edge->flag |= PEDGE_COLLAPSE;
01689         e1->flag |= PEDGE_COLLAPSE;
01690         e2->flag |= PEDGE_COLLAPSE;
01691     }
01692 
01693     if (pair) {
01694         PFace *f = pair->face;
01695         PEdge *e1 = pair->next, *e2 = e1->next;
01696 
01697         f->flag |= PFACE_COLLAPSE;
01698         pair->flag |= PEDGE_COLLAPSE;
01699         e1->flag |= PEDGE_COLLAPSE;
01700         e2->flag |= PEDGE_COLLAPSE;
01701     }
01702 }
01703 
01704 static void p_split_vertex(PEdge *edge, PEdge *pair)
01705 {
01706     PVert *newv, *keepv;
01707     PEdge *e;
01708 
01709     p_collapsing_verts(edge, pair, &newv, &keepv);
01710 
01711     /* update edge pairs */
01712     if (edge) {
01713         PEdge *e1 = edge->next, *e2 = e1->next;
01714 
01715         if (e1->pair)
01716             e1->pair->pair = e1;
01717         if (e2->pair)
01718             e2->pair->pair = e2;
01719 
01720         e2->vert->edge = e2;
01721         p_vert_fix_edge_pointer(e2->vert);
01722         keepv->edge = e1;
01723     }
01724 
01725     if (pair) {
01726         PEdge *e1 = pair->next, *e2 = e1->next;
01727 
01728         if (e1->pair)
01729             e1->pair->pair = e1;
01730         if (e2->pair)
01731             e2->pair->pair = e2;
01732 
01733         e2->vert->edge = e2;
01734         p_vert_fix_edge_pointer(e2->vert);
01735         keepv->edge = pair;
01736     }
01737 
01738     p_vert_fix_edge_pointer(keepv);
01739 
01740     /* set e->vert pointers to restored vertex */
01741     e = newv->edge;
01742     do {
01743         e->vert = newv;
01744         e = p_wheel_edge_next(e);
01745     } while (e && (e != newv->edge));
01746 }
01747 
01748 static PBool p_collapse_allowed_topologic(PEdge *edge, PEdge *pair)
01749 {
01750     PVert *oldv, *keepv;
01751 
01752     p_collapsing_verts(edge, pair, &oldv, &keepv);
01753 
01754     /* boundary edges */
01755     if (!edge || !pair) {
01756         /* avoid collapsing chart into an edge */
01757         if (edge && !edge->next->pair && !edge->next->next->pair)
01758             return P_FALSE;
01759         else if (pair && !pair->next->pair && !pair->next->next->pair)
01760             return P_FALSE;
01761     }
01762     /* avoid merging two boundaries (oldv and keepv are on the 'other side' of
01763      * the chart) */
01764     else if (!p_vert_interior(oldv) && !p_vert_interior(keepv))
01765         return P_FALSE;
01766     
01767     return P_TRUE;
01768 }
01769 
01770 static PBool p_collapse_normal_flipped(float *v1, float *v2, float *vold, float *vnew)
01771 {
01772     float nold[3], nnew[3], sub1[3], sub2[3];
01773 
01774     sub_v3_v3v3(sub1, vold, v1);
01775     sub_v3_v3v3(sub2, vold, v2);
01776     cross_v3_v3v3(nold, sub1, sub2);
01777 
01778     sub_v3_v3v3(sub1, vnew, v1);
01779     sub_v3_v3v3(sub2, vnew, v2);
01780     cross_v3_v3v3(nnew, sub1, sub2);
01781 
01782     return (dot_v3v3(nold, nnew) <= 0.0f);
01783 }
01784 
01785 static PBool p_collapse_allowed_geometric(PEdge *edge, PEdge *pair)
01786 {
01787     PVert *oldv, *keepv;
01788     PEdge *e;
01789     float angulardefect, angle;
01790 
01791     p_collapsing_verts(edge, pair, &oldv, &keepv);
01792 
01793     angulardefect = 2 * M_PI;
01794 
01795     e = oldv->edge;
01796     do {
01797         float a[3], b[3], minangle, maxangle;
01798         PEdge *e1 = e->next, *e2 = e1->next;
01799         PVert *v1 = e1->vert, *v2 = e2->vert;
01800         int i;
01801 
01802         angle = p_vec_angle(v1->co, oldv->co, v2->co);
01803         angulardefect -= angle;
01804 
01805         /* skip collapsing faces */
01806         if (v1 == keepv || v2 == keepv) {
01807             e = p_wheel_edge_next(e);
01808             continue;
01809         }
01810 
01811         if (p_collapse_normal_flipped(v1->co, v2->co, oldv->co, keepv->co))
01812             return P_FALSE;
01813     
01814         a[0] = angle;
01815         a[1] = p_vec_angle(v2->co, v1->co, oldv->co);
01816         a[2] = M_PI - a[0] - a[1];
01817 
01818         b[0] = p_vec_angle(v1->co, keepv->co, v2->co);
01819         b[1] = p_vec_angle(v2->co, v1->co, keepv->co);
01820         b[2] = M_PI - b[0] - b[1];
01821 
01822         /* abf criterion 1: avoid sharp and obtuse angles */
01823         minangle = 15.0f * M_PI / 180.0f;
01824         maxangle = M_PI - minangle;
01825 
01826         for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
01827             if ((b[i] < a[i]) && (b[i] < minangle))
01828                 return P_FALSE;
01829             else if ((b[i] > a[i]) && (b[i] > maxangle))
01830                 return P_FALSE;
01831         }
01832 
01833         e = p_wheel_edge_next(e);
01834     } while (e && (e != oldv->edge));
01835 
01836     if (p_vert_interior(oldv)) {
01837         /* hlscm criterion: angular defect smaller than threshold */
01838         if (fabs(angulardefect) > (M_PI * 30.0 / 180.0))
01839             return P_FALSE;
01840     }
01841     else {
01842         PVert *v1 = p_boundary_edge_next(oldv->edge)->vert;
01843         PVert *v2 = p_boundary_edge_prev(oldv->edge)->vert;
01844 
01845         /* abf++ criterion 2: avoid collapsing verts inwards */
01846         if (p_vert_interior(keepv))
01847             return P_FALSE;
01848         
01849         /* don't collapse significant boundary changes */
01850         angle = p_vec_angle(v1->co, oldv->co, v2->co);
01851         if (angle < (M_PI * 160.0 / 180.0))
01852             return P_FALSE;
01853     }
01854 
01855     return P_TRUE;
01856 }
01857 
01858 static PBool p_collapse_allowed(PEdge *edge, PEdge *pair)
01859 {
01860     PVert *oldv, *keepv;
01861 
01862     p_collapsing_verts(edge, pair, &oldv, &keepv);
01863 
01864     if (oldv->flag & PVERT_PIN)
01865         return P_FALSE;
01866     
01867     return (p_collapse_allowed_topologic(edge, pair) &&
01868             p_collapse_allowed_geometric(edge, pair));
01869 }
01870 
01871 static float p_collapse_cost(PEdge *edge, PEdge *pair)
01872 {
01873     /* based on volume and boundary optimization from:
01874      * "Fast and Memory Efficient Polygonal Simplification" P. Lindstrom, G. Turk */
01875 
01876     PVert *oldv, *keepv;
01877     PEdge *e;
01878     PFace *oldf1, *oldf2;
01879     float volumecost = 0.0f, areacost = 0.0f, edgevec[3], cost, weight, elen;
01880     float shapecost = 0.0f;
01881     float shapeold = 0.0f, shapenew = 0.0f;
01882     int nshapeold = 0, nshapenew = 0;
01883 
01884     p_collapsing_verts(edge, pair, &oldv, &keepv);
01885     oldf1 = (edge) ? edge->face : NULL;
01886     oldf2 = (pair) ? pair->face : NULL;
01887 
01888     sub_v3_v3v3(edgevec, keepv->co, oldv->co);
01889 
01890     e = oldv->edge;
01891     do {
01892         float a1, a2, a3;
01893         float *co1 = e->next->vert->co;
01894         float *co2 = e->next->next->vert->co;
01895 
01896         if ((e->face != oldf1) && (e->face != oldf2)) {
01897             float tetrav2[3], tetrav3[3], c[3];
01898 
01899             /* tetrahedron volume = (1/3!)*|a.(b x c)| */
01900             sub_v3_v3v3(tetrav2, co1, oldv->co);
01901             sub_v3_v3v3(tetrav3, co2, oldv->co);
01902             cross_v3_v3v3(c, tetrav2, tetrav3);
01903 
01904             volumecost += fabs(dot_v3v3(edgevec, c) / 6.0f);
01905 #if 0
01906             shapecost += dot_v3v3(co1, keepv->co);
01907 
01908             if (p_wheel_edge_next(e) == NULL)
01909                 shapecost += dot_v3v3(co2, keepv->co);
01910 #endif
01911 
01912             p_triangle_angles(oldv->co, co1, co2, &a1, &a2, &a3);
01913             a1 = a1 - M_PI / 3.0;
01914             a2 = a2 - M_PI / 3.0;
01915             a3 = a3 - M_PI / 3.0;
01916             shapeold = (a1 * a1 + a2 * a2 + a3 * a3) / ((M_PI / 2) * (M_PI / 2));
01917 
01918             nshapeold++;
01919         }
01920         else {
01921             p_triangle_angles(keepv->co, co1, co2, &a1, &a2, &a3);
01922             a1 = a1 - M_PI / 3.0;
01923             a2 = a2 - M_PI / 3.0;
01924             a3 = a3 - M_PI / 3.0;
01925             shapenew = (a1 * a1 + a2 * a2 + a3 * a3) / ((M_PI / 2) * (M_PI / 2));
01926 
01927             nshapenew++;
01928         }
01929 
01930         e = p_wheel_edge_next(e);
01931     } while (e && (e != oldv->edge));
01932 
01933     if (!p_vert_interior(oldv)) {
01934         PVert *v1 = p_boundary_edge_prev(oldv->edge)->vert;
01935         PVert *v2 = p_boundary_edge_next(oldv->edge)->vert;
01936 
01937         areacost = area_tri_v3(oldv->co, v1->co, v2->co);
01938     }
01939 
01940     elen = len_v3(edgevec);
01941     weight = 1.0f; /* 0.2f */
01942     cost = weight * volumecost * volumecost + elen * elen * areacost * areacost;
01943 #if 0
01944     cost += shapecost;
01945 #else
01946     shapeold /= nshapeold;
01947     shapenew /= nshapenew;
01948     shapecost = (shapeold + 0.00001) / (shapenew + 0.00001);
01949 
01950     cost *= shapecost;
01951 #endif
01952 
01953     return cost;
01954 }
01955     
01956 static void p_collapse_cost_vertex(PVert *vert, float *mincost, PEdge **mine)
01957 {
01958     PEdge *e, *enext, *pair;
01959 
01960     *mine = NULL;
01961     *mincost = 0.0f;
01962     e = vert->edge;
01963     do {
01964         if (p_collapse_allowed(e, e->pair)) {
01965             float cost = p_collapse_cost(e, e->pair);
01966 
01967             if ((*mine == NULL) || (cost < *mincost)) {
01968                 *mincost = cost;
01969                 *mine = e;
01970             }
01971         }
01972 
01973         enext = p_wheel_edge_next(e);
01974 
01975         if (enext == NULL) {
01976             /* the other boundary edge, where we only have the pair halfedge */
01977             pair = e->next->next;
01978 
01979             if (p_collapse_allowed(NULL, pair)) {
01980                 float cost = p_collapse_cost(NULL, pair);
01981 
01982                 if ((*mine == NULL) || (cost < *mincost)) {
01983                     *mincost = cost;
01984                     *mine = pair;
01985                 }
01986             }
01987 
01988             break;
01989         }
01990 
01991         e = enext;
01992     } while (e != vert->edge);
01993 }
01994 
01995 static void p_chart_post_collapse_flush(PChart *chart, PEdge *collapsed)
01996 {
01997     /* move to collapsed_ */
01998 
01999     PVert *v, *nextv = NULL, *verts = chart->verts;
02000     PEdge *e, *nexte = NULL, *edges = chart->edges, *laste = NULL;
02001     PFace *f, *nextf = NULL, *faces = chart->faces;
02002 
02003     chart->verts = chart->collapsed_verts = NULL;
02004     chart->edges = chart->collapsed_edges = NULL;
02005     chart->faces = chart->collapsed_faces = NULL;
02006 
02007     chart->nverts = chart->nedges = chart->nfaces = 0;
02008 
02009     for (v = verts; v; v = nextv) {
02010         nextv = v->nextlink;
02011 
02012         if (v->flag & PVERT_COLLAPSE) {
02013             v->nextlink = chart->collapsed_verts;
02014             chart->collapsed_verts = v;
02015         }
02016         else {
02017             v->nextlink = chart->verts;
02018             chart->verts = v;
02019             chart->nverts++;
02020         }
02021     }
02022 
02023     for (e = edges; e; e = nexte) {
02024         nexte = e->nextlink;
02025 
02026         if (!collapsed || !(e->flag & PEDGE_COLLAPSE_EDGE)) {
02027             if (e->flag & PEDGE_COLLAPSE) {
02028                 e->nextlink = chart->collapsed_edges;
02029                 chart->collapsed_edges = e;
02030             }
02031             else {
02032                 e->nextlink = chart->edges;
02033                 chart->edges = e;
02034                 chart->nedges++;
02035             }
02036         }
02037     }
02038 
02039     /* these are added last so they can be popped of in the right order
02040      * for splitting */
02041     for (e = collapsed; e; e = e->nextlink) {
02042         e->nextlink = e->u.nextcollapse;
02043         laste = e;
02044     }
02045     if (laste) {
02046         laste->nextlink = chart->collapsed_edges;
02047         chart->collapsed_edges = collapsed;
02048     }
02049 
02050     for (f = faces; f; f = nextf) {
02051         nextf = f->nextlink;
02052 
02053         if (f->flag & PFACE_COLLAPSE) {
02054             f->nextlink = chart->collapsed_faces;
02055             chart->collapsed_faces = f;
02056         }
02057         else {
02058             f->nextlink = chart->faces;
02059             chart->faces = f;
02060             chart->nfaces++;
02061         }
02062     }
02063 }
02064 
02065 static void p_chart_post_split_flush(PChart *chart)
02066 {
02067     /* move from collapsed_ */
02068 
02069     PVert *v, *nextv = NULL;
02070     PEdge *e, *nexte = NULL;
02071     PFace *f, *nextf = NULL;
02072 
02073     for (v = chart->collapsed_verts; v; v = nextv) {
02074         nextv = v->nextlink;
02075         v->nextlink = chart->verts;
02076         chart->verts = v;
02077         chart->nverts++;
02078     }
02079 
02080     for (e = chart->collapsed_edges; e; e = nexte) {
02081         nexte = e->nextlink;
02082         e->nextlink = chart->edges;
02083         chart->edges = e;
02084         chart->nedges++;
02085     }
02086 
02087     for (f = chart->collapsed_faces; f; f = nextf) {
02088         nextf = f->nextlink;
02089         f->nextlink = chart->faces;
02090         chart->faces = f;
02091         chart->nfaces++;
02092     }
02093 
02094     chart->collapsed_verts = NULL;
02095     chart->collapsed_edges = NULL;
02096     chart->collapsed_faces = NULL;
02097 }
02098 
02099 static void p_chart_simplify_compute(PChart *chart)
02100 {
02101     /* Computes a list of edge collapses / vertex splits. The collapsed
02102      * simplices go in the chart->collapsed_* lists, The original and
02103      * collapsed may then be view as stacks, where the next collapse/split
02104      * is at the top of the respective lists. */
02105 
02106     Heap *heap = BLI_heap_new();
02107     PVert *v, **wheelverts;
02108     PEdge *collapsededges = NULL, *e;
02109     int nwheelverts, i, ncollapsed = 0;
02110 
02111     wheelverts = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(PVert *) * chart->nverts, "PChartWheelVerts");
02112 
02113     /* insert all potential collapses into heap */
02114     for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink) {
02115         float cost;
02116         PEdge *e = NULL;
02117         
02118         p_collapse_cost_vertex(v, &cost, &e);
02119 
02120         if (e)
02121             v->u.heaplink = BLI_heap_insert(heap, cost, e);
02122         else
02123             v->u.heaplink = NULL;
02124     }
02125 
02126     for (e = chart->edges; e; e = e->nextlink)
02127         e->u.nextcollapse = NULL;
02128 
02129     /* pop edge collapse out of heap one by one */
02130     while (!BLI_heap_empty(heap)) {
02131         if (ncollapsed == NCOLLAPSE)
02132             break;
02133 
02134         HeapNode *link = BLI_heap_top(heap);
02135         PEdge *edge = (PEdge *)BLI_heap_popmin(heap), *pair = edge->pair;
02136         PVert *oldv, *keepv;
02137         PEdge *wheele, *nexte;
02138 
02139         /* remember the edges we collapsed */
02140         edge->u.nextcollapse = collapsededges;
02141         collapsededges = edge;
02142 
02143         if (edge->vert->u.heaplink != link) {
02144             edge->flag |= (PEDGE_COLLAPSE_EDGE | PEDGE_COLLAPSE_PAIR);
02145             edge->next->vert->u.heaplink = NULL;
02146             SWAP(PEdge *, edge, pair);
02147         }
02148         else {
02149             edge->flag |= PEDGE_COLLAPSE_EDGE;
02150             edge->vert->u.heaplink = NULL;
02151         }
02152 
02153         p_collapsing_verts(edge, pair, &oldv, &keepv);
02154 
02155         /* gather all wheel verts and remember them before collapse */
02156         nwheelverts = 0;
02157         wheele = oldv->edge;
02158 
02159         do {
02160             wheelverts[nwheelverts++] = wheele->next->vert;
02161             nexte = p_wheel_edge_next(wheele);
02162 
02163             if (nexte == NULL)
02164                 wheelverts[nwheelverts++] = wheele->next->next->vert;
02165 
02166             wheele = nexte;
02167         } while (wheele && (wheele != oldv->edge));
02168 
02169         /* collapse */
02170         p_collapse_edge(edge, pair);
02171 
02172         for (i = 0; i < nwheelverts; i++) {
02173             float cost;
02174             PEdge *collapse = NULL;
02175 
02176             v = wheelverts[i];
02177 
02178             if (v->u.heaplink) {
02179                 BLI_heap_remove(heap, v->u.heaplink);
02180                 v->u.heaplink = NULL;
02181             }
02182         
02183             p_collapse_cost_vertex(v, &cost, &collapse);
02184 
02185             if (collapse)
02186                 v->u.heaplink = BLI_heap_insert(heap, cost, collapse);
02187         }
02188 
02189         ncollapsed++;
02190     }
02191 
02192     MEM_freeN(wheelverts);
02193     BLI_heap_free(heap, NULL);
02194 
02195     p_chart_post_collapse_flush(chart, collapsededges);
02196 }
02197 
02198 static void p_chart_complexify(PChart *chart)
02199 {
02200     PEdge *e, *pair, *edge;
02201     PVert *newv, *keepv;
02202     int x = 0;
02203 
02204     for (e = chart->collapsed_edges; e; e = e->nextlink) {
02205         if (!(e->flag & PEDGE_COLLAPSE_EDGE))
02206             break;
02207 
02208         edge = e;
02209         pair = e->pair;
02210 
02211         if (edge->flag & PEDGE_COLLAPSE_PAIR) {
02212             SWAP(PEdge *, edge, pair);
02213         }
02214 
02215         p_split_vertex(edge, pair);
02216         p_collapsing_verts(edge, pair, &newv, &keepv);
02217 
02218         if (x >= NCOLLAPSEX) {
02219             newv->uv[0] = keepv->uv[0];
02220             newv->uv[1] = keepv->uv[1];
02221         }
02222         else {
02223             p_vert_harmonic_insert(newv);
02224             x++;
02225         }
02226     }
02227 
02228     p_chart_post_split_flush(chart);
02229 }
02230 
02231 #if 0
02232 static void p_chart_simplify(PChart *chart)
02233 {
02234     /* Not implemented, needs proper reordering in split_flush. */
02235 }
02236 #endif
02237 #endif
02238 
02239 /* ABF */
02240 
02241 #define ABF_MAX_ITER 20
02242 
02243 typedef struct PAbfSystem {
02244     int ninterior, nfaces, nangles;
02245     float *alpha, *beta, *sine, *cosine, *weight;
02246     float *bAlpha, *bTriangle, *bInterior;
02247     float *lambdaTriangle, *lambdaPlanar, *lambdaLength;
02248     float (*J2dt)[3], *bstar, *dstar;
02249     float minangle, maxangle;
02250 } PAbfSystem;
02251 
02252 static void p_abf_setup_system(PAbfSystem *sys)
02253 {
02254     int i;
02255 
02256     sys->alpha = (float *)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * sys->nangles, "ABFalpha");
02257     sys->beta = (float *)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * sys->nangles, "ABFbeta");
02258     sys->sine = (float *)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * sys->nangles, "ABFsine");
02259     sys->cosine = (float *)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * sys->nangles, "ABFcosine");
02260     sys->weight = (float *)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * sys->nangles, "ABFweight");
02261 
02262     sys->bAlpha = (float *)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * sys->nangles, "ABFbalpha");
02263     sys->bTriangle = (float *)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * sys->nfaces, "ABFbtriangle");
02264     sys->bInterior = (float *)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * 2 * sys->ninterior, "ABFbinterior");
02265 
02266     sys->lambdaTriangle = (float *)MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * sys->nfaces, "ABFlambdatri");
02267     sys->lambdaPlanar = (float *)MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * sys->ninterior, "ABFlamdaplane");
02268     sys->lambdaLength = (float *)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * sys->ninterior, "ABFlambdalen");
02269 
02270     sys->J2dt = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * sys->nangles * 3, "ABFj2dt");
02271     sys->bstar = (float *)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * sys->nfaces, "ABFbstar");
02272     sys->dstar = (float *)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * sys->nfaces, "ABFdstar");
02273 
02274     for (i = 0; i < sys->ninterior; i++)
02275         sys->lambdaLength[i] = 1.0;
02276     
02277     sys->minangle = 7.5 * M_PI / 180.0;
02278     sys->maxangle = (float)M_PI - sys->minangle;
02279 }
02280 
02281 static void p_abf_free_system(PAbfSystem *sys)
02282 {
02283     MEM_freeN(sys->alpha);
02284     MEM_freeN(sys->beta);
02285     MEM_freeN(sys->sine);
02286     MEM_freeN(sys->cosine);
02287     MEM_freeN(sys->weight);
02288     MEM_freeN(sys->bAlpha);
02289     MEM_freeN(sys->bTriangle);
02290     MEM_freeN(sys->bInterior);
02291     MEM_freeN(sys->lambdaTriangle);
02292     MEM_freeN(sys->lambdaPlanar);
02293     MEM_freeN(sys->lambdaLength);
02294     MEM_freeN(sys->J2dt);
02295     MEM_freeN(sys->bstar);
02296     MEM_freeN(sys->dstar);
02297 }
02298 
02299 static void p_abf_compute_sines(PAbfSystem *sys)
02300 {
02301     int i;
02302     float *sine = sys->sine, *cosine = sys->cosine, *alpha = sys->alpha;
02303 
02304     for (i = 0; i < sys->nangles; i++, sine++, cosine++, alpha++) {
02305         *sine = sin(*alpha);
02306         *cosine = cos(*alpha);
02307     }
02308 }
02309 
02310 static float p_abf_compute_sin_product(PAbfSystem *sys, PVert *v, int aid)
02311 {
02312     PEdge *e, *e1, *e2;
02313     float sin1, sin2;
02314 
02315     sin1 = sin2 = 1.0;
02316 
02317     e = v->edge;
02318     do {
02319         e1 = e->next;
02320         e2 = e->next->next;
02321 
02322         if (aid == e1->u.id) {
02323             /* we are computing a derivative for this angle,
02324              * so we use cos and drop the other part */
02325             sin1 *= sys->cosine[e1->u.id];
02326             sin2 = 0.0;
02327         }
02328         else
02329             sin1 *= sys->sine[e1->u.id];
02330 
02331         if (aid == e2->u.id) {
02332             /* see above */
02333             sin1 = 0.0;
02334             sin2 *= sys->cosine[e2->u.id];
02335         }
02336         else
02337             sin2 *= sys->sine[e2->u.id];
02338 
02339         e = e->next->next->pair;
02340     } while (e && (e != v->edge));
02341 
02342     return (sin1 - sin2);
02343 }
02344 
02345 static float p_abf_compute_grad_alpha(PAbfSystem *sys, PFace *f, PEdge *e)
02346 {
02347     PVert *v = e->vert, *v1 = e->next->vert, *v2 = e->next->next->vert;
02348     float deriv;
02349 
02350     deriv = (sys->alpha[e->u.id] - sys->beta[e->u.id]) * sys->weight[e->u.id];
02351     deriv += sys->lambdaTriangle[f->u.id];
02352 
02353     if (v->flag & PVERT_INTERIOR) {
02354         deriv += sys->lambdaPlanar[v->u.id];
02355     }
02356 
02357     if (v1->flag & PVERT_INTERIOR) {
02358         float product = p_abf_compute_sin_product(sys, v1, e->u.id);
02359         deriv += sys->lambdaLength[v1->u.id] * product;
02360     }
02361 
02362     if (v2->flag & PVERT_INTERIOR) {
02363         float product = p_abf_compute_sin_product(sys, v2, e->u.id);
02364         deriv += sys->lambdaLength[v2->u.id] * product;
02365     }
02366 
02367     return deriv;
02368 }
02369 
02370 static float p_abf_compute_gradient(PAbfSystem *sys, PChart *chart)
02371 {
02372     PFace *f;
02373     PEdge *e;
02374     PVert *v;
02375     float norm = 0.0;
02376 
02377     for (f = chart->faces; f; f = f->nextlink) {
02378         PEdge *e1 = f->edge, *e2 = e1->next, *e3 = e2->next;
02379         float gtriangle, galpha1, galpha2, galpha3;
02380 
02381         galpha1 = p_abf_compute_grad_alpha(sys, f, e1);
02382         galpha2 = p_abf_compute_grad_alpha(sys, f, e2);
02383         galpha3 = p_abf_compute_grad_alpha(sys, f, e3);
02384 
02385         sys->bAlpha[e1->u.id] = -galpha1;
02386         sys->bAlpha[e2->u.id] = -galpha2;
02387         sys->bAlpha[e3->u.id] = -galpha3;
02388 
02389         norm += galpha1 * galpha1 + galpha2 * galpha2 + galpha3 * galpha3;
02390 
02391         gtriangle = sys->alpha[e1->u.id] + sys->alpha[e2->u.id] + sys->alpha[e3->u.id] - (float)M_PI;
02392         sys->bTriangle[f->u.id] = -gtriangle;
02393         norm += gtriangle * gtriangle;
02394     }
02395 
02396     for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink) {
02397         if (v->flag & PVERT_INTERIOR) {
02398             float gplanar = -2 * M_PI, glength;
02399 
02400             e = v->edge;
02401             do {
02402                 gplanar += sys->alpha[e->u.id];
02403                 e = e->next->next->pair;
02404             } while (e && (e != v->edge));
02405 
02406             sys->bInterior[v->u.id] = -gplanar;
02407             norm += gplanar * gplanar;
02408 
02409             glength = p_abf_compute_sin_product(sys, v, -1);
02410             sys->bInterior[sys->ninterior + v->u.id] = -glength;
02411             norm += glength * glength;
02412         }
02413     }
02414 
02415     return norm;
02416 }
02417 
02418 static PBool p_abf_matrix_invert(PAbfSystem *sys, PChart *chart)
02419 {
02420     PFace *f;
02421     PEdge *e;
02422     int i, j, ninterior = sys->ninterior, nvar = 2 * sys->ninterior;
02423     PBool success;
02424 
02425     nlNewContext();
02426     nlSolverParameteri(NL_NB_VARIABLES, nvar);
02427 
02428     nlBegin(NL_SYSTEM);
02429 
02430     nlBegin(NL_MATRIX);
02431 
02432     for (i = 0; i < nvar; i++)
02433         nlRightHandSideAdd(0, i, sys->bInterior[i]);
02434 
02435     for (f = chart->faces; f; f = f->nextlink) {
02436         float wi1, wi2, wi3, b, si, beta[3], j2[3][3], W[3][3];
02437         float row1[6], row2[6], row3[6];
02438         int vid[6];
02439         PEdge *e1 = f->edge, *e2 = e1->next, *e3 = e2->next;
02440         PVert *v1 = e1->vert, *v2 = e2->vert, *v3 = e3->vert;
02441 
02442         wi1 = 1.0f / sys->weight[e1->u.id];
02443         wi2 = 1.0f / sys->weight[e2->u.id];
02444         wi3 = 1.0f / sys->weight[e3->u.id];
02445 
02446         /* bstar1 = (J1*dInv*bAlpha - bTriangle) */
02447         b = sys->bAlpha[e1->u.id] * wi1;
02448         b += sys->bAlpha[e2->u.id] * wi2;
02449         b += sys->bAlpha[e3->u.id] * wi3;
02450         b -= sys->bTriangle[f->u.id];
02451 
02452         /* si = J1*d*J1t */
02453         si = 1.0f / (wi1 + wi2 + wi3);
02454 
02455         /* J1t*si*bstar1 - bAlpha */
02456         beta[0] = b * si - sys->bAlpha[e1->u.id];
02457         beta[1] = b * si - sys->bAlpha[e2->u.id];
02458         beta[2] = b * si - sys->bAlpha[e3->u.id];
02459 
02460         /* use this later for computing other lambda's */
02461         sys->bstar[f->u.id] = b;
02462         sys->dstar[f->u.id] = si;
02463 
02464         /* set matrix */
02465         W[0][0] = si - sys->weight[e1->u.id]; W[0][1] = si; W[0][2] = si;
02466         W[1][0] = si; W[1][1] = si - sys->weight[e2->u.id]; W[1][2] = si;
02467         W[2][0] = si; W[2][1] = si; W[2][2] = si - sys->weight[e3->u.id];
02468 
02469         vid[0] = vid[1] = vid[2] = vid[3] = vid[4] = vid[5] = -1;
02470 
02471         if (v1->flag & PVERT_INTERIOR) {
02472             vid[0] = v1->u.id;
02473             vid[3] = ninterior + v1->u.id;
02474 
02475             sys->J2dt[e1->u.id][0] = j2[0][0] = 1.0f * wi1;
02476             sys->J2dt[e2->u.id][0] = j2[1][0] = p_abf_compute_sin_product(sys, v1, e2->u.id) * wi2;
02477             sys->J2dt[e3->u.id][0] = j2[2][0] = p_abf_compute_sin_product(sys, v1, e3->u.id) * wi3;
02478 
02479             nlRightHandSideAdd(0, v1->u.id, j2[0][0] * beta[0]);
02480             nlRightHandSideAdd(0, ninterior + v1->u.id, j2[1][0] * beta[1] + j2[2][0] * beta[2]);
02481 
02482             row1[0] = j2[0][0] * W[0][0];
02483             row2[0] = j2[0][0] * W[1][0];
02484             row3[0] = j2[0][0] * W[2][0];
02485 
02486             row1[3] = j2[1][0] * W[0][1] + j2[2][0] * W[0][2];
02487             row2[3] = j2[1][0] * W[1][1] + j2[2][0] * W[1][2];
02488             row3[3] = j2[1][0] * W[2][1] + j2[2][0] * W[2][2];
02489         }
02490 
02491         if (v2->flag & PVERT_INTERIOR) {
02492             vid[1] = v2->u.id;
02493             vid[4] = ninterior + v2->u.id;
02494 
02495             sys->J2dt[e1->u.id][1] = j2[0][1] = p_abf_compute_sin_product(sys, v2, e1->u.id) * wi1;
02496             sys->J2dt[e2->u.id][1] = j2[1][1] = 1.0f * wi2;
02497             sys->J2dt[e3->u.id][1] = j2[2][1] = p_abf_compute_sin_product(sys, v2, e3->u.id) * wi3;
02498 
02499             nlRightHandSideAdd(0, v2->u.id, j2[1][1] * beta[1]);
02500             nlRightHandSideAdd(0, ninterior + v2->u.id, j2[0][1] * beta[0] + j2[2][1] * beta[2]);
02501 
02502             row1[1] = j2[1][1] * W[0][1];
02503             row2[1] = j2[1][1] * W[1][1];
02504             row3[1] = j2[1][1] * W[2][1];
02505 
02506             row1[4] = j2[0][1] * W[0][0] + j2[2][1] * W[0][2];
02507             row2[4] = j2[0][1] * W[1][0] + j2[2][1] * W[1][2];
02508             row3[4] = j2[0][1] * W[2][0] + j2[2][1] * W[2][2];
02509         }
02510 
02511         if (v3->flag & PVERT_INTERIOR) {
02512             vid[2] = v3->u.id;
02513             vid[5] = ninterior + v3->u.id;
02514 
02515             sys->J2dt[e1->u.id][2] = j2[0][2] = p_abf_compute_sin_product(sys, v3, e1->u.id) * wi1;
02516             sys->J2dt[e2->u.id][2] = j2[1][2] = p_abf_compute_sin_product(sys, v3, e2->u.id) * wi2;
02517             sys->J2dt[e3->u.id][2] = j2[2][2] = 1.0f * wi3;
02518 
02519             nlRightHandSideAdd(0, v3->u.id, j2[2][2] * beta[2]);
02520             nlRightHandSideAdd(0, ninterior + v3->u.id, j2[0][2] * beta[0] + j2[1][2] * beta[1]);
02521 
02522             row1[2] = j2[2][2] * W[0][2];
02523             row2[2] = j2[2][2] * W[1][2];
02524             row3[2] = j2[2][2] * W[2][2];
02525 
02526             row1[5] = j2[0][2] * W[0][0] + j2[1][2] * W[0][1];
02527             row2[5] = j2[0][2] * W[1][0] + j2[1][2] * W[1][1];
02528             row3[5] = j2[0][2] * W[2][0] + j2[1][2] * W[2][1];
02529         }
02530 
02531         for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
02532             int r = vid[i];
02533 
02534             if (r == -1)
02535                 continue;
02536 
02537             for (j = 0; j < 6; j++) {
02538                 int c = vid[j];
02539 
02540                 if (c == -1)
02541                     continue;
02542 
02543                 if (i == 0)
02544                     nlMatrixAdd(r, c, j2[0][i] * row1[j]);
02545                 else
02546                     nlMatrixAdd(r + ninterior, c, j2[0][i] * row1[j]);
02547 
02548                 if (i == 1)
02549                     nlMatrixAdd(r, c, j2[1][i] * row2[j]);
02550                 else
02551                     nlMatrixAdd(r + ninterior, c, j2[1][i] * row2[j]);
02552 
02553 
02554                 if (i == 2)
02555                     nlMatrixAdd(r, c, j2[2][i] * row3[j]);
02556                 else
02557                     nlMatrixAdd(r + ninterior, c, j2[2][i] * row3[j]);
02558             }
02559         }
02560     }
02561 
02562     nlEnd(NL_MATRIX);
02563 
02564     nlEnd(NL_SYSTEM);
02565 
02566     success = nlSolve();
02567 
02568     if (success) {
02569         for (f = chart->faces; f; f = f->nextlink) {
02570             float dlambda1, pre[3], dalpha;
02571             PEdge *e1 = f->edge, *e2 = e1->next, *e3 = e2->next;
02572             PVert *v1 = e1->vert, *v2 = e2->vert, *v3 = e3->vert;
02573 
02574             pre[0] = pre[1] = pre[2] = 0.0;
02575 
02576             if (v1->flag & PVERT_INTERIOR) {
02577                 float x = nlGetVariable(0, v1->u.id);
02578                 float x2 = nlGetVariable(0, ninterior + v1->u.id);
02579                 pre[0] += sys->J2dt[e1->u.id][0] * x;
02580                 pre[1] += sys->J2dt[e2->u.id][0] * x2;
02581                 pre[2] += sys->J2dt[e3->u.id][0] * x2;
02582             }
02583 
02584             if (v2->flag & PVERT_INTERIOR) {
02585                 float x = nlGetVariable(0, v2->u.id);
02586                 float x2 = nlGetVariable(0, ninterior + v2->u.id);
02587                 pre[0] += sys->J2dt[e1->u.id][1] * x2;
02588                 pre[1] += sys->J2dt[e2->u.id][1] * x;
02589                 pre[2] += sys->J2dt[e3->u.id][1] * x2;
02590             }
02591 
02592             if (v3->flag & PVERT_INTERIOR) {
02593                 float x = nlGetVariable(0, v3->u.id);
02594                 float x2 = nlGetVariable(0, ninterior + v3->u.id);
02595                 pre[0] += sys->J2dt[e1->u.id][2] * x2;
02596                 pre[1] += sys->J2dt[e2->u.id][2] * x2;
02597                 pre[2] += sys->J2dt[e3->u.id][2] * x;
02598             }
02599 
02600             dlambda1 = pre[0] + pre[1] + pre[2];
02601             dlambda1 = sys->dstar[f->u.id] * (sys->bstar[f->u.id] - dlambda1);
02602             
02603             sys->lambdaTriangle[f->u.id] += dlambda1;
02604 
02605             dalpha = (sys->bAlpha[e1->u.id] - dlambda1);
02606             sys->alpha[e1->u.id] += dalpha / sys->weight[e1->u.id] - pre[0];
02607 
02608             dalpha = (sys->bAlpha[e2->u.id] - dlambda1);
02609             sys->alpha[e2->u.id] += dalpha / sys->weight[e2->u.id] - pre[1];
02610 
02611             dalpha = (sys->bAlpha[e3->u.id] - dlambda1);
02612             sys->alpha[e3->u.id] += dalpha / sys->weight[e3->u.id] - pre[2];
02613 
02614             /* clamp */
02615             e = f->edge;
02616             do {
02617                 if (sys->alpha[e->u.id] > (float)M_PI)
02618                     sys->alpha[e->u.id] = (float)M_PI;
02619                 else if (sys->alpha[e->u.id] < 0.0f)
02620                     sys->alpha[e->u.id] = 0.0f;
02621             } while (e != f->edge);
02622         }
02623 
02624         for (i = 0; i < ninterior; i++) {
02625             sys->lambdaPlanar[i] += nlGetVariable(0, i);
02626             sys->lambdaLength[i] += nlGetVariable(0, ninterior + i);
02627         }
02628     }
02629 
02630     nlDeleteContext(nlGetCurrent());
02631 
02632     return success;
02633 }
02634 
02635 static PBool p_chart_abf_solve(PChart *chart)
02636 {
02637     PVert *v;
02638     PFace *f;
02639     PEdge *e, *e1, *e2, *e3;
02640     PAbfSystem sys;
02641     int i;
02642     float /* lastnorm, */ /* UNUSED */ limit = (chart->nfaces > 100) ? 1.0f : 0.001f;
02643 
02644     /* setup id's */
02645     sys.ninterior = sys.nfaces = sys.nangles = 0;
02646 
02647     for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink) {
02648         if (p_vert_interior(v)) {
02649             v->flag |= PVERT_INTERIOR;
02650             v->u.id = sys.ninterior++;
02651         }
02652         else
02653             v->flag &= ~PVERT_INTERIOR;
02654     }
02655 
02656     for (f = chart->faces; f; f = f->nextlink) {
02657         e1 = f->edge; e2 = e1->next; e3 = e2->next;
02658         f->u.id = sys.nfaces++;
02659 
02660         /* angle id's are conveniently stored in half edges */
02661         e1->u.id = sys.nangles++;
02662         e2->u.id = sys.nangles++;
02663         e3->u.id = sys.nangles++;
02664     }
02665 
02666     p_abf_setup_system(&sys);
02667 
02668     /* compute initial angles */
02669     for (f = chart->faces; f; f = f->nextlink) {
02670         float a1, a2, a3;
02671 
02672         e1 = f->edge; e2 = e1->next; e3 = e2->next;
02673         p_face_angles(f, &a1, &a2, &a3);
02674 
02675         if (a1 < sys.minangle)
02676             a1 = sys.minangle;
02677         else if (a1 > sys.maxangle)
02678             a1 = sys.maxangle;
02679         if (a2 < sys.minangle)
02680             a2 = sys.minangle;
02681         else if (a2 > sys.maxangle)
02682             a2 = sys.maxangle;
02683         if (a3 < sys.minangle)
02684             a3 = sys.minangle;
02685         else if (a3 > sys.maxangle)
02686             a3 = sys.maxangle;
02687 
02688         sys.alpha[e1->u.id] = sys.beta[e1->u.id] = a1;
02689         sys.alpha[e2->u.id] = sys.beta[e2->u.id] = a2;
02690         sys.alpha[e3->u.id] = sys.beta[e3->u.id] = a3;
02691 
02692         sys.weight[e1->u.id] = 2.0f / (a1 * a1);
02693         sys.weight[e2->u.id] = 2.0f / (a2 * a2);
02694         sys.weight[e3->u.id] = 2.0f / (a3 * a3);
02695     }
02696 
02697     for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink) {
02698         if (v->flag & PVERT_INTERIOR) {
02699             float anglesum = 0.0, scale;
02700 
02701             e = v->edge;
02702             do {
02703                 anglesum += sys.beta[e->u.id];
02704                 e = e->next->next->pair;
02705             } while (e && (e != v->edge));
02706 
02707             scale = (anglesum == 0.0f) ? 0.0f : 2.0f * (float)M_PI / anglesum;
02708 
02709             e = v->edge;
02710             do {
02711                 sys.beta[e->u.id] = sys.alpha[e->u.id] = sys.beta[e->u.id] * scale;
02712                 e = e->next->next->pair;
02713             } while (e && (e != v->edge));
02714         }
02715     }
02716 
02717     if (sys.ninterior > 0) {
02718         p_abf_compute_sines(&sys);
02719
