02720         /* iteration */
02721         /* lastnorm = 1e10; */ /* UNUSED */
02722 
02723         for (i = 0; i < ABF_MAX_ITER; i++) {
02724             float norm = p_abf_compute_gradient(&sys, chart);
02725 
02726             /* lastnorm = norm; */ /* UNUSED */
02727 
02728             if (norm < limit)
02729                 break;
02730 
02731             if (!p_abf_matrix_invert(&sys, chart)) {
02732                 param_warning("ABF failed to invert matrix");
02733                 p_abf_free_system(&sys);
02734                 return P_FALSE;
02735             }
02736 
02737             p_abf_compute_sines(&sys);
02738         }
02739 
02740         if (i == ABF_MAX_ITER) {
02741             param_warning("ABF maximum iterations reached");
02742             p_abf_free_system(&sys);
02743             return P_FALSE;
02744         }
02745     }
02746 
02747     chart->u.lscm.abf_alpha = MEM_dupallocN(sys.alpha);
02748     p_abf_free_system(&sys);
02749 
02750     return P_TRUE;
02751 }
02752 
02753 /* Least Squares Conformal Maps */
02754 
02755 static void p_chart_pin_positions(PChart *chart, PVert **pin1, PVert **pin2)
02756 {
02757     if (pin1 == pin2) {
02758         /* degenerate case */
02759         PFace *f = chart->faces;
02760         *pin1 = f->edge->vert;
02761         *pin2 = f->edge->next->vert;
02762 
02763         (*pin1)->uv[0] = 0.0f;
02764         (*pin1)->uv[1] = 0.5f;
02765         (*pin2)->uv[0] = 1.0f;
02766         (*pin2)->uv[1] = 0.5f;
02767     }
02768     else {
02769         int diru, dirv, dirx, diry;
02770         float sub[3];
02771 
02772         sub_v3_v3v3(sub, (*pin1)->co, (*pin2)->co);
02773         sub[0] = fabs(sub[0]);
02774         sub[1] = fabs(sub[1]);
02775         sub[2] = fabs(sub[2]);
02776 
02777         if ((sub[0] > sub[1]) && (sub[0] > sub[2])) {
02778             dirx = 0;
02779             diry = (sub[1] > sub[2]) ? 1 : 2;
02780         }
02781         else if ((sub[1] > sub[0]) && (sub[1] > sub[2])) {
02782             dirx = 1;
02783             diry = (sub[0] > sub[2]) ? 0 : 2;
02784         }
02785         else {
02786             dirx = 2;
02787             diry = (sub[0] > sub[1]) ? 0 : 1;
02788         }
02789 
02790         if (dirx == 2) {
02791             diru = 1;
02792             dirv = 0;
02793         }
02794         else {
02795             diru = 0;
02796             dirv = 1;
02797         }
02798 
02799         (*pin1)->uv[diru] = (*pin1)->co[dirx];
02800         (*pin1)->uv[dirv] = (*pin1)->co[diry];
02801         (*pin2)->uv[diru] = (*pin2)->co[dirx];
02802         (*pin2)->uv[dirv] = (*pin2)->co[diry];
02803     }
02804 }
02805 
02806 static PBool p_chart_symmetry_pins(PChart *chart, PEdge *outer, PVert **pin1, PVert **pin2)
02807 {
02808     PEdge *be, *lastbe = NULL, *maxe1 = NULL, *maxe2 = NULL, *be1, *be2;
02809     PEdge *cure = NULL, *firste1 = NULL, *firste2 = NULL, *nextbe;
02810     float maxlen = 0.0f, curlen = 0.0f, totlen = 0.0f, firstlen = 0.0f;
02811     float len1, len2;
02812  
02813     /* find longest series of verts split in the chart itself, these are
02814      * marked during construction */
02815     be = outer;
02816     lastbe = p_boundary_edge_prev(be);
02817     do {
02818         float len = p_edge_length(be);
02819         totlen += len;
02820 
02821         nextbe = p_boundary_edge_next(be);
02822 
02823         if ((be->vert->flag & PVERT_SPLIT) ||
02824             (lastbe->vert->flag & nextbe->vert->flag & PVERT_SPLIT))
02825         {
02826             if (!cure) {
02827                 if (be == outer)
02828                     firste1 = be;
02829                 cure = be;
02830             }
02831             else
02832                 curlen += p_edge_length(lastbe);
02833         }
02834         else if (cure) {
02835             if (curlen > maxlen) {
02836                 maxlen = curlen;
02837                 maxe1 = cure;
02838                 maxe2 = lastbe;
02839             }
02840 
02841             if (firste1 == cure) {
02842                 firstlen = curlen;
02843                 firste2 = lastbe;
02844             }
02845 
02846             curlen = 0.0f;
02847             cure = NULL;
02848         }
02849 
02850         lastbe = be;
02851         be = nextbe;
02852     } while (be != outer);
02853 
02854     /* make sure we also count a series of splits over the starting point */
02855     if (cure && (cure != outer)) {
02856         firstlen += curlen + p_edge_length(be);
02857 
02858         if (firstlen > maxlen) {
02859             maxlen = firstlen;
02860             maxe1 = cure;
02861             maxe2 = firste2;
02862         }
02863     }
02864 
02865     if (!maxe1 || !maxe2 || (maxlen < 0.5f * totlen))
02866         return P_FALSE;
02867     
02868     /* find pin1 in the split vertices */
02869     be1 = maxe1;
02870     be2 = maxe2;
02871     len1 = 0.0f;
02872     len2 = 0.0f;
02873 
02874     do {
02875         if (len1 < len2) {
02876             len1 += p_edge_length(be1);
02877             be1 = p_boundary_edge_next(be1);
02878         }
02879         else {
02880             be2 = p_boundary_edge_prev(be2);
02881             len2 += p_edge_length(be2);
02882         }
02883     } while (be1 != be2);
02884 
02885     *pin1 = be1->vert;
02886 
02887     /* find pin2 outside the split vertices */
02888     be1 = maxe1;
02889     be2 = maxe2;
02890     len1 = 0.0f;
02891     len2 = 0.0f;
02892 
02893     do {
02894         if (len1 < len2) {
02895             be1 = p_boundary_edge_prev(be1);
02896             len1 += p_edge_length(be1);
02897         }
02898         else {
02899             len2 += p_edge_length(be2);
02900             be2 = p_boundary_edge_next(be2);
02901         }
02902     } while (be1 != be2);
02903 
02904     *pin2 = be1->vert;
02905 
02906     p_chart_pin_positions(chart, pin1, pin2);
02907 
02908     return P_TRUE;
02909 }
02910 
02911 static void p_chart_extrema_verts(PChart *chart, PVert **pin1, PVert **pin2)
02912 {
02913     float minv[3], maxv[3], dirlen;
02914     PVert *v, *minvert[3], *maxvert[3];
02915     int i, dir;
02916 
02917     /* find minimum and maximum verts over x/y/z axes */
02918     minv[0] = minv[1] = minv[2] = 1e20;
02919     maxv[0] = maxv[1] = maxv[2] = -1e20;
02920 
02921     minvert[0] = minvert[1] = minvert[2] = NULL;
02922     maxvert[0] = maxvert[1] = maxvert[2] = NULL;
02923 
02924     for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink) {
02925         for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
02926             if (v->co[i] < minv[i]) {
02927                 minv[i] = v->co[i];
02928                 minvert[i] = v;
02929             }
02930             if (v->co[i] > maxv[i]) {
02931                 maxv[i] = v->co[i];
02932                 maxvert[i] = v;
02933             }
02934         }
02935     }
02936 
02937     /* find axes with longest distance */
02938     dir = 0;
02939     dirlen = -1.0;
02940 
02941     for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
02942         if (maxv[i] - minv[i] > dirlen) {
02943             dir = i;
02944             dirlen = maxv[i] - minv[i];
02945         }
02946     }
02947 
02948     *pin1 = minvert[dir];
02949     *pin2 = maxvert[dir];
02950 
02951     p_chart_pin_positions(chart, pin1, pin2);
02952 }
02953 
02954 static void p_chart_lscm_load_solution(PChart *chart)
02955 {
02956     PVert *v;
02957 
02958     for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink) {
02959         v->uv[0] = nlGetVariable(0, 2 * v->u.id);
02960         v->uv[1] = nlGetVariable(0, 2 * v->u.id + 1);
02961     }
02962 }
02963 
02964 static void p_chart_lscm_begin(PChart *chart, PBool live, PBool abf)
02965 {
02966     PVert *v, *pin1, *pin2;
02967     PBool select = P_FALSE, deselect = P_FALSE;
02968     int npins = 0, id = 0;
02969 
02970     /* give vertices matrix indices and count pins */
02971     for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink) {
02972         if (v->flag & PVERT_PIN) {
02973             npins++;
02974             if (v->flag & PVERT_SELECT)
02975                 select = P_TRUE;
02976         }
02977 
02978         if (!(v->flag & PVERT_SELECT))
02979             deselect = P_TRUE;
02980     }
02981 
02982     if ((live && (!select || !deselect)) || (npins == 1)) {
02983         chart->u.lscm.context = NULL;
02984     }
02985     else {
02986 #if 0
02987         p_chart_simplify_compute(chart);
02988         p_chart_topological_sanity_check(chart);
02989 #endif
02990 
02991         if (abf) {
02992             if (!p_chart_abf_solve(chart))
02993                 param_warning("ABF solving failed: falling back to LSCM.\n");
02994         }
02995 
02996         if (npins <= 1) {
02997             /* not enough pins, lets find some ourself */
02998             PEdge *outer;
02999 
03000             p_chart_boundaries(chart, NULL, &outer);
03001 
03002             if (!p_chart_symmetry_pins(chart, outer, &pin1, &pin2))
03003                 p_chart_extrema_verts(chart, &pin1, &pin2);
03004 
03005             chart->u.lscm.pin1 = pin1;
03006             chart->u.lscm.pin2 = pin2;
03007         }
03008         else {
03009             chart->flag |= PCHART_NOPACK;
03010         }
03011 
03012         for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink)
03013             v->u.id = id++;
03014 
03015         nlNewContext();
03016         nlSolverParameteri(NL_NB_VARIABLES, 2 * chart->nverts);
03017         nlSolverParameteri(NL_NB_ROWS, 2 * chart->nfaces);
03018         nlSolverParameteri(NL_LEAST_SQUARES, NL_TRUE);
03019 
03020         chart->u.lscm.context = nlGetCurrent();
03021     }
03022 }
03023 
03024 static PBool p_chart_lscm_solve(PHandle *handle, PChart *chart)
03025 {
03026     PVert *v, *pin1 = chart->u.lscm.pin1, *pin2 = chart->u.lscm.pin2;
03027     PFace *f;
03028     float *alpha = chart->u.lscm.abf_alpha;
03029     int row;
03030 
03031     nlMakeCurrent(chart->u.lscm.context);
03032 
03033     nlBegin(NL_SYSTEM);
03034 
03035 #if 0
03036     /* TODO: make loading pins work for simplify/complexify. */
03037 #endif
03038 
03039     for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink)
03040         if (v->flag & PVERT_PIN)
03041             p_vert_load_pin_select_uvs(handle, v);  /* reload for live */
03042 
03043     if (chart->u.lscm.pin1) {
03044         nlLockVariable(2 * pin1->u.id);
03045         nlLockVariable(2 * pin1->u.id + 1);
03046         nlLockVariable(2 * pin2->u.id);
03047         nlLockVariable(2 * pin2->u.id + 1);
03048 
03049         nlSetVariable(0, 2 * pin1->u.id, pin1->uv[0]);
03050         nlSetVariable(0, 2 * pin1->u.id + 1, pin1->uv[1]);
03051         nlSetVariable(0, 2 * pin2->u.id, pin2->uv[0]);
03052         nlSetVariable(0, 2 * pin2->u.id + 1, pin2->uv[1]);
03053     }
03054     else {
03055         /* set and lock the pins */
03056         for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink) {
03057             if (v->flag & PVERT_PIN) {
03058                 nlLockVariable(2 * v->u.id);
03059                 nlLockVariable(2 * v->u.id + 1);
03060 
03061                 nlSetVariable(0, 2 * v->u.id, v->uv[0]);
03062                 nlSetVariable(0, 2 * v->u.id + 1, v->uv[1]);
03063             }
03064         }
03065     }
03066 
03067     /* construct matrix */
03068 
03069     nlBegin(NL_MATRIX);
03070 
03071     row = 0;
03072     for (f = chart->faces; f; f = f->nextlink) {
03073         PEdge *e1 = f->edge, *e2 = e1->next, *e3 = e2->next;
03074         PVert *v1 = e1->vert, *v2 = e2->vert, *v3 = e3->vert;
03075         float a1, a2, a3, ratio, cosine, sine;
03076         float sina1, sina2, sina3, sinmax;
03077 
03078         if (alpha) {
03079             /* use abf angles if passed on */
03080             a1 = *(alpha++);
03081             a2 = *(alpha++);
03082             a3 = *(alpha++);
03083         }
03084         else
03085             p_face_angles(f, &a1, &a2, &a3);
03086 
03087         sina1 = sin(a1);
03088         sina2 = sin(a2);
03089         sina3 = sin(a3);
03090 
03091         sinmax = MAX3(sina1, sina2, sina3);
03092 
03093         /* shift vertices to find most stable order */
03094         if (sina3 != sinmax) {
03095             SHIFT3(PVert *, v1, v2, v3);
03096             SHIFT3(float, a1, a2, a3);
03097             SHIFT3(float, sina1, sina2, sina3);
03098 
03099             if (sina2 == sinmax) {
03100                 SHIFT3(PVert *, v1, v2, v3);
03101                 SHIFT3(float, a1, a2, a3);
03102                 SHIFT3(float, sina1, sina2, sina3);
03103             }
03104         }
03105 
03106         /* angle based lscm formulation */
03107         ratio = (sina3 == 0.0f) ? 1.0f : sina2 / sina3;
03108         cosine = cosf(a1) * ratio;
03109         sine = sina1 * ratio;
03110 
03111 #if 0
03112         nlBegin(NL_ROW);
03113         nlCoefficient(2 * v1->u.id,   cosine - 1.0);
03114         nlCoefficient(2 * v1->u.id + 1, -sine);
03115         nlCoefficient(2 * v2->u.id,   -cosine);
03116         nlCoefficient(2 * v2->u.id + 1, sine);
03117         nlCoefficient(2 * v3->u.id,   1.0);
03118         nlEnd(NL_ROW);
03119 
03120         nlBegin(NL_ROW);
03121         nlCoefficient(2 * v1->u.id,   sine);
03122         nlCoefficient(2 * v1->u.id + 1, cosine - 1.0);
03123         nlCoefficient(2 * v2->u.id,   -sine);
03124         nlCoefficient(2 * v2->u.id + 1, -cosine);
03125         nlCoefficient(2 * v3->u.id + 1, 1.0);
03126         nlEnd(NL_ROW);
03127 #else
03128         nlMatrixAdd(row, 2 * v1->u.id,   cosine - 1.0f);
03129         nlMatrixAdd(row, 2 * v1->u.id + 1, -sine);
03130         nlMatrixAdd(row, 2 * v2->u.id,   -cosine);
03131         nlMatrixAdd(row, 2 * v2->u.id + 1, sine);
03132         nlMatrixAdd(row, 2 * v3->u.id,   1.0);
03133         row++;
03134 
03135         nlMatrixAdd(row, 2 * v1->u.id,   sine);
03136         nlMatrixAdd(row, 2 * v1->u.id + 1, cosine - 1.0f);
03137         nlMatrixAdd(row, 2 * v2->u.id,   -sine);
03138         nlMatrixAdd(row, 2 * v2->u.id + 1, -cosine);
03139         nlMatrixAdd(row, 2 * v3->u.id + 1, 1.0);
03140         row++;
03141 #endif
03142     }
03143 
03144     nlEnd(NL_MATRIX);
03145 
03146     nlEnd(NL_SYSTEM);
03147 
03148     if (nlSolveAdvanced(NULL, NL_TRUE)) {
03149         p_chart_lscm_load_solution(chart);
03150         return P_TRUE;
03151     }
03152     else {
03153         for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink) {
03154             v->uv[0] = 0.0f;
03155             v->uv[1] = 0.0f;
03156         }
03157     }
03158 
03159     return P_FALSE;
03160 }
03161 
03162 static void p_chart_lscm_end(PChart *chart)
03163 {
03164     if (chart->u.lscm.context)
03165         nlDeleteContext(chart->u.lscm.context);
03166     
03167     if (chart->u.lscm.abf_alpha) {
03168         MEM_freeN(chart->u.lscm.abf_alpha);
03169         chart->u.lscm.abf_alpha = NULL;
03170     }
03171 
03172     chart->u.lscm.context = NULL;
03173     chart->u.lscm.pin1 = NULL;
03174     chart->u.lscm.pin2 = NULL;
03175 }
03176 
03177 /* Stretch */
03178 
03179 #define P_STRETCH_ITER 20
03180 
03181 static void p_stretch_pin_boundary(PChart *chart)
03182 {
03183     PVert *v;
03184 
03185     for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink)
03186         if (v->edge->pair == NULL)
03187             v->flag |= PVERT_PIN;
03188         else
03189             v->flag &= ~PVERT_PIN;
03190 }
03191 
03192 static float p_face_stretch(PFace *f)
03193 {
03194     float T, w, tmp[3];
03195     float Ps[3], Pt[3];
03196     float a, c, area;
03197     PEdge *e1 = f->edge, *e2 = e1->next, *e3 = e2->next;
03198     PVert *v1 = e1->vert, *v2 = e2->vert, *v3 = e3->vert;
03199 
03200     area = p_face_uv_area_signed(f);
03201 
03202     if (area <= 0.0f) /* flipped face -> infinite stretch */
03203         return 1e10f;
03204     
03205     w = 1.0f / (2.0f * area);
03206 
03207     /* compute derivatives */
03208     copy_v3_v3(Ps, v1->co);
03209     mul_v3_fl(Ps, (v2->uv[1] - v3->uv[1]));
03210 
03211     copy_v3_v3(tmp, v2->co);
03212     mul_v3_fl(tmp, (v3->uv[1] - v1->uv[1]));
03213     add_v3_v3(Ps, tmp);
03214 
03215     copy_v3_v3(tmp, v3->co);
03216     mul_v3_fl(tmp, (v1->uv[1] - v2->uv[1]));
03217     add_v3_v3(Ps, tmp);
03218 
03219     mul_v3_fl(Ps, w);
03220 
03221     copy_v3_v3(Pt, v1->co);
03222     mul_v3_fl(Pt, (v3->uv[0] - v2->uv[0]));
03223 
03224     copy_v3_v3(tmp, v2->co);
03225     mul_v3_fl(tmp, (v1->uv[0] - v3->uv[0]));
03226     add_v3_v3(Pt, tmp);
03227 
03228     copy_v3_v3(tmp, v3->co);
03229     mul_v3_fl(tmp, (v2->uv[0] - v1->uv[0]));
03230     add_v3_v3(Pt, tmp);
03231 
03232     mul_v3_fl(Pt, w);
03233 
03234     /* Sander Tensor */
03235     a = dot_v3v3(Ps, Ps);
03236     c = dot_v3v3(Pt, Pt);
03237 
03238     T =  sqrt(0.5f * (a + c));
03239     if (f->flag & PFACE_FILLED)
03240         T *= 0.2f;
03241 
03242     return T;
03243 }
03244 
03245 static float p_stretch_compute_vertex(PVert *v)
03246 {
03247     PEdge *e = v->edge;
03248     float sum = 0.0f;
03249 
03250     do {
03251         sum += p_face_stretch(e->face);
03252         e = p_wheel_edge_next(e);
03253     } while (e && e != (v->edge));
03254 
03255     return sum;
03256 }
03257 
03258 static void p_chart_stretch_minimize(PChart *chart, RNG *rng)
03259 {
03260     PVert *v;
03261     PEdge *e;
03262     int j, nedges;
03263     float orig_stretch, low, stretch_low, high, stretch_high, mid, stretch;
03264     float orig_uv[2], dir[2], random_angle, trusted_radius;
03265 
03266     for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink) {
03267         if ((v->flag & PVERT_PIN) || !(v->flag & PVERT_SELECT))
03268             continue;
03269 
03270         orig_stretch = p_stretch_compute_vertex(v);
03271         orig_uv[0] = v->uv[0];
03272         orig_uv[1] = v->uv[1];
03273 
03274         /* move vertex in a random direction */
03275         trusted_radius = 0.0f;
03276         nedges = 0;
03277         e = v->edge;
03278 
03279         do {
03280             trusted_radius += p_edge_uv_length(e);
03281             nedges++;
03282 
03283             e = p_wheel_edge_next(e);
03284         } while (e && e != (v->edge));
03285 
03286         trusted_radius /= 2 * nedges;
03287 
03288         random_angle = rng_getFloat(rng) * 2.0f * (float)M_PI;
03289         dir[0] = trusted_radius * cosf(random_angle);
03290         dir[1] = trusted_radius * sinf(random_angle);
03291 
03292         /* calculate old and new stretch */
03293         low = 0;
03294         stretch_low = orig_stretch;
03295 
03296         add_v2_v2v2(v->uv, orig_uv, dir);
03297         high = 1;
03298         stretch = stretch_high = p_stretch_compute_vertex(v);
03299 
03300         /* binary search for lowest stretch position */
03301         for (j = 0; j < P_STRETCH_ITER; j++) {
03302             mid = 0.5f * (low + high);
03303             v->uv[0] = orig_uv[0] + mid * dir[0];
03304             v->uv[1] = orig_uv[1] + mid * dir[1];
03305             stretch = p_stretch_compute_vertex(v);
03306 
03307             if (stretch_low < stretch_high) {
03308                 high = mid;
03309                 stretch_high = stretch;
03310             }
03311             else {
03312                 low = mid;
03313                 stretch_low = stretch;
03314             }
03315         }
03316 
03317         /* no luck, stretch has increased, reset to old values */
03318         if (stretch >= orig_stretch)
03319             copy_v2_v2(v->uv, orig_uv);
03320     }
03321 }
03322 
03323 /* Minimum area enclosing rectangle for packing */
03324 
03325 static int p_compare_geometric_uv(const void *a, const void *b)
03326 {
03327     PVert *v1 = *(PVert **)a;
03328     PVert *v2 = *(PVert **)b;
03329 
03330     if (v1->uv[0] < v2->uv[0])
03331         return -1;
03332     else if (v1->uv[0] == v2->uv[0]) {
03333         if (v1->uv[1] < v2->uv[1])
03334             return -1;
03335         else if (v1->uv[1] == v2->uv[1])
03336             return 0;
03337         else
03338             return 1;
03339     }
03340     else
03341         return 1;
03342 }
03343 
03344 static PBool p_chart_convex_hull(PChart *chart, PVert ***verts, int *nverts, int *right)
03345 {
03346     /* Graham algorithm, taken from:
03347      * http://aspn.activestate.com/ASPN/Cookbook/Python/Recipe/117225 */
03348 
03349     PEdge *be, *e;
03350     int npoints = 0, i, ulen, llen;
03351     PVert **U, **L, **points, **p;
03352 
03353     p_chart_boundaries(chart, NULL, &be);
03354 
03355     if (!be)
03356         return P_FALSE;
03357 
03358     e = be;
03359     do {
03360         npoints++;
03361         e = p_boundary_edge_next(e);
03362     } while (e != be);
03363 
03364     p = points = (PVert **)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(PVert *) * npoints * 2, "PCHullpoints");
03365     U = (PVert **)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(PVert *) * npoints, "PCHullU");
03366     L = (PVert **)MEM_mallocN(sizeof(PVert *) * npoints, "PCHullL");
03367 
03368     e = be;
03369     do {
03370         *p = e->vert;
03371         p++;
03372         e = p_boundary_edge_next(e);
03373     } while (e != be);
03374 
03375     qsort(points, npoints, sizeof(PVert *), p_compare_geometric_uv);
03376 
03377     ulen = llen = 0;
03378     for (p = points, i = 0; i < npoints; i++, p++) {
03379         while ((ulen > 1) && (p_area_signed(U[ulen - 2]->uv, (*p)->uv, U[ulen - 1]->uv) <= 0))
03380             ulen--;
03381         while ((llen > 1) && (p_area_signed(L[llen - 2]->uv, (*p)->uv, L[llen - 1]->uv) >= 0))
03382             llen--;
03383 
03384         U[ulen] = *p;
03385         ulen++;
03386         L[llen] = *p;
03387         llen++;
03388     }
03389 
03390     npoints = 0;
03391     for (p = points, i = 0; i < ulen; i++, p++, npoints++)
03392         *p = U[i];
03393 
03394     /* the first and last point in L are left out, since they are also in U */
03395     for (i = llen - 2; i > 0; i--, p++, npoints++)
03396         *p = L[i];
03397 
03398     *verts = points;
03399     *nverts = npoints;
03400     *right = ulen - 1;
03401 
03402     MEM_freeN(U);
03403     MEM_freeN(L);
03404 
03405     return P_TRUE;
03406 }
03407 
03408 static float p_rectangle_area(float *p1, float *dir, float *p2, float *p3, float *p4)
03409 {
03410     /* given 4 points on the rectangle edges and the direction of on edge,
03411      * compute the area of the rectangle */
03412 
03413     float orthodir[2], corner1[2], corner2[2], corner3[2];
03414 
03415     orthodir[0] = dir[1];
03416     orthodir[1] = -dir[0];
03417 
03418     if (!p_intersect_line_2d_dir(p1, dir, p2, orthodir, corner1))
03419         return 1e10;
03420 
03421     if (!p_intersect_line_2d_dir(p1, dir, p4, orthodir, corner2))
03422         return 1e10;
03423 
03424     if (!p_intersect_line_2d_dir(p3, dir, p4, orthodir, corner3))
03425         return 1e10;
03426 
03427     return len_v2v2(corner1, corner2) * len_v2v2(corner2, corner3);
03428 }
03429 
03430 static float p_chart_minimum_area_angle(PChart *chart)
03431 {
03432     /* minimum area enclosing rectangle with rotating calipers, info:
03433      * http://cgm.cs.mcgill.ca/~orm/maer.html */
03434 
03435     float rotated, minarea, minangle, area, len;
03436     float *angles, miny, maxy, v[2], a[4], mina;
03437     int npoints, right, mini, maxi, i, idx[4], nextidx;
03438     PVert **points, *p1, *p2, *p3, *p4, *p1n;
03439 
03440     /* compute convex hull */
03441     if (!p_chart_convex_hull(chart, &points, &npoints, &right))
03442         return 0.0;
03443 
03444     /* find left/top/right/bottom points, and compute angle for each point */
03445     angles = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * npoints, "PMinAreaAngles");
03446 
03447     mini = maxi = 0;
03448     miny = 1e10;
03449     maxy = -1e10;
03450 
03451     for (i = 0; i < npoints; i++) {
03452         p1 = (i == 0) ? points[npoints - 1] : points[i - 1];
03453         p2 = points[i];
03454         p3 = (i == npoints - 1) ? points[0] : points[i + 1];
03455 
03456         angles[i] = (float)M_PI - p_vec2_angle(p1->uv, p2->uv, p3->uv);
03457 
03458         if (points[i]->uv[1] < miny) {
03459             miny = points[i]->uv[1];
03460             mini = i;
03461         }
03462         if (points[i]->uv[1] > maxy) {
03463             maxy = points[i]->uv[1];
03464             maxi = i;
03465         }
03466     }
03467 
03468     /* left, top, right, bottom */
03469     idx[0] = 0;
03470     idx[1] = maxi;
03471     idx[2] = right;
03472     idx[3] = mini;
03473 
03474     v[0] = points[idx[0]]->uv[0];
03475     v[1] = points[idx[0]]->uv[1] + 1.0f;
03476     a[0] = p_vec2_angle(points[(idx[0] + 1) % npoints]->uv, points[idx[0]]->uv, v);
03477 
03478     v[0] = points[idx[1]]->uv[0] + 1.0f;
03479     v[1] = points[idx[1]]->uv[1];
03480     a[1] = p_vec2_angle(points[(idx[1] + 1) % npoints]->uv, points[idx[1]]->uv, v);
03481 
03482     v[0] = points[idx[2]]->uv[0];
03483     v[1] = points[idx[2]]->uv[1] - 1.0f;
03484     a[2] = p_vec2_angle(points[(idx[2] + 1) % npoints]->uv, points[idx[2]]->uv, v);
03485 
03486     v[0] = points[idx[3]]->uv[0] - 1.0f;
03487     v[1] = points[idx[3]]->uv[1];
03488     a[3] = p_vec2_angle(points[(idx[3] + 1) % npoints]->uv, points[idx[3]]->uv, v);
03489 
03490     /* 4 rotating calipers */
03491 
03492     rotated = 0.0;
03493     minarea = 1e10;
03494     minangle = 0.0;
03495 
03496     while (rotated <= (float)(M_PI / 2.0)) { /* INVESTIGATE: how far to rotate? */
03497         /* rotate with the smallest angle */
03498         mini = 0;
03499         mina = 1e10;
03500 
03501         for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
03502             if (a[i] < mina) {
03503                 mina = a[i];
03504                 mini = i;
03505             }
03506 
03507         rotated += mina;
03508         nextidx = (idx[mini] + 1) % npoints;
03509 
03510         a[mini] = angles[nextidx];
03511         a[(mini + 1) % 4] = a[(mini + 1) % 4] - mina;
03512         a[(mini + 2) % 4] = a[(mini + 2) % 4] - mina;
03513         a[(mini + 3) % 4] = a[(mini + 3) % 4] - mina;
03514 
03515         /* compute area */
03516         p1 = points[idx[mini]];
03517         p1n = points[nextidx];
03518         p2 = points[idx[(mini + 1) % 4]];
03519         p3 = points[idx[(mini + 2) % 4]];
03520         p4 = points[idx[(mini + 3) % 4]];
03521 
03522         len = len_v2v2(p1->uv, p1n->uv);
03523 
03524         if (len > 0.0f) {
03525             len = 1.0f / len;
03526             v[0] = (p1n->uv[0] - p1->uv[0]) * len;
03527             v[1] = (p1n->uv[1] - p1->uv[1]) * len;
03528 
03529             area = p_rectangle_area(p1->uv, v, p2->uv, p3->uv, p4->uv);
03530 
03531             /* remember smallest area */
03532             if (area < minarea) {
03533                 minarea = area;
03534                 minangle = rotated;
03535             }
03536         }
03537 
03538         idx[mini] = nextidx;
03539     }
03540 
03541     /* try keeping rotation as small as possible */
03542     if (minangle > (float)(M_PI / 4))
03543         minangle -= (float)(M_PI / 2.0);
03544 
03545     MEM_freeN(angles);
03546     MEM_freeN(points);
03547 
03548     return minangle;
03549 }
03550 
03551 static void p_chart_rotate_minimum_area(PChart *chart)
03552 {
03553     float angle = p_chart_minimum_area_angle(chart);
03554     float sine = sin(angle);
03555     float cosine = cos(angle);
03556     PVert *v;
03557 
03558     for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink) {
03559         float oldu = v->uv[0], oldv = v->uv[1];
03560         v->uv[0] = cosine * oldu - sine * oldv;
03561         v->uv[1] = sine * oldu + cosine * oldv;
03562     }
03563 }
03564 
03565 /* Area Smoothing */
03566 
03567 /* 2d bsp tree for inverse mapping - that's a bit silly */
03568 
03569 typedef struct SmoothTriangle {
03570     float co1[2], co2[2], co3[2];
03571     float oco1[2], oco2[2], oco3[2];
03572 } SmoothTriangle;
03573 
03574 typedef struct SmoothNode {
03575     struct SmoothNode *c1, *c2;
03576     SmoothTriangle **tri;
03577     float split;
03578     int axis, ntri;
03579 } SmoothNode;
03580 
03581 static void p_barycentric_2d(float *v1, float *v2, float *v3, float *p, float *b)
03582 {
03583     float a[2], c[2], h[2], div;
03584 
03585     a[0] = v2[0] - v1[0];
03586     a[1] = v2[1] - v1[1];
03587     c[0] = v3[0] - v1[0];
03588     c[1] = v3[1] - v1[1];
03589 
03590     div = a[0] * c[1] - a[1] * c[0];
03591 
03592     if (div == 0.0f) {
03593         b[0] = 1.0f / 3.0f;
03594         b[1] = 1.0f / 3.0f;
03595         b[2] = 1.0f / 3.0f;
03596     }
03597     else {
03598         h[0] = p[0] - v1[0];
03599         h[1] = p[1] - v1[1];
03600 
03601         div = 1.0f / div;
03602 
03603         b[1] = (h[0] * c[1] - h[1] * c[0]) * div;
03604         b[2] = (a[0] * h[1] - a[1] * h[0]) * div;
03605         b[0] = 1.0f - b[1] - b[2];
03606     }
03607 }
03608 
03609 static PBool p_triangle_inside(SmoothTriangle *t, float *co)
03610 {
03611     float b[3];
03612 
03613     p_barycentric_2d(t->co1, t->co2, t->co3, co, b);
03614 
03615     if ((b[0] >= 0.0f) && (b[1] >= 0.0f) && (b[2] >= 0.0f)) {
03616         co[0] = t->oco1[0] * b[0] + t->oco2[0] * b[1] + t->oco3[0] * b[2];
03617         co[1] = t->oco1[1] * b[0] + t->oco2[1] * b[1] + t->oco3[1] * b[2];
03618         return P_TRUE;
03619     }
03620 
03621     return P_FALSE;
03622 }
03623 
03624 static SmoothNode *p_node_new(MemArena *arena, SmoothTriangle **tri, int ntri, float *bmin, float *bmax, int depth)
03625 {
03626     SmoothNode *node = BLI_memarena_alloc(arena, sizeof *node);
03627     int axis, i, t1size = 0, t2size = 0;
03628     float split, /* mi, */ /* UNUSED */ mx;
03629     SmoothTriangle **t1, **t2, *t;
03630 
03631     node->tri = tri;
03632     node->ntri = ntri;
03633 
03634     if (ntri <= 10 || depth >= 15)
03635         return node;
03636     
03637     t1 = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(SmoothTriangle) * ntri, "PNodeTri1");
03638     t2 = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(SmoothTriangle) * ntri, "PNodeTri1");
03639 
03640     axis = (bmax[0] - bmin[0] > bmax[1] - bmin[1]) ? 0 : 1;
03641     split = 0.5f * (bmin[axis] + bmax[axis]);
03642 
03643     for (i = 0; i < ntri; i++) {
03644         t = tri[i];
03645 
03646         if ((t->co1[axis] <= split) || (t->co2[axis] <= split) || (t->co3[axis] <= split)) {
03647             t1[t1size] = t;
03648             t1size++;
03649         }
03650         if ((t->co1[axis] >= split) || (t->co2[axis] >= split) || (t->co3[axis] >= split)) {
03651             t2[t2size] = t;
03652             t2size++;
03653         }
03654     }
03655 
03656     if ((t1size == t2size) && (t1size == ntri)) {
03657         MEM_freeN(t1);
03658         MEM_freeN(t2);
03659         return node;
03660     }
03661     
03662     node->tri = NULL;
03663     node->ntri = 0;
03664     MEM_freeN(tri);
03665 
03666     node->axis = axis;
03667     node->split = split;
03668 
03669     /* mi = bmin[axis]; */ /* UNUSED */
03670     mx = bmax[axis];
03671     bmax[axis] = split;
03672     node->c1 = p_node_new(arena, t1, t1size, bmin, bmax, depth + 1);
03673 
03674     bmin[axis] = bmax[axis];
03675     bmax[axis] = mx;
03676     node->c2 = p_node_new(arena, t2, t2size, bmin, bmax, depth + 1);
03677 
03678     return node;
03679 }
03680 
03681 static void p_node_delete(SmoothNode *node)
03682 {
03683     if (node->c1)
03684         p_node_delete(node->c1);
03685     if (node->c2)
03686         p_node_delete(node->c2);
03687     if (node->tri)
03688         MEM_freeN(node->tri);
03689 }
03690 
03691 static PBool p_node_intersect(SmoothNode *node, float *co)
03692 {
03693     int i;
03694 
03695     if (node->tri) {
03696         for (i = 0; i < node->ntri; i++)
03697             if (p_triangle_inside(node->tri[i], co))
03698                 return P_TRUE;
03699 
03700         return P_FALSE;
03701     }
03702     else {
03703         if (co[node->axis] < node->split)
03704             return p_node_intersect(node->c1, co);
03705         else
03706             return p_node_intersect(node->c2, co);
03707     }
03708 
03709 }
03710 
03711 /* smooothing */
03712 
03713 static int p_compare_float(const void *a, const void *b)
03714 {
03715     if (*((float *)a) < *((float *)b))
03716         return -1;
03717     else if (*((float *)a) == *((float *)b))
03718         return 0;
03719     else
03720         return 1;
03721 }
03722 
03723 static float p_smooth_median_edge_length(PChart *chart)
03724 {
03725     PEdge *e;
03726     float *lengths = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(chart->edges) * chart->nedges, "PMedianLength");
03727     float median;
03728     int i;
03729 
03730     /* ok, so i'm lazy */
03731     for (i = 0, e = chart->edges; e; e = e->nextlink, i++)
03732         lengths[i] = p_edge_length(e);
03733     
03734     qsort(lengths, i, sizeof(float), p_compare_float);
03735 
03736     median = lengths[i / 2];
03737     MEM_freeN(lengths);
03738 
03739     return median;
03740 }
03741 
03742 static float p_smooth_distortion(PEdge *e, float avg2d, float avg3d)
03743 {
03744     float len2d = p_edge_uv_length(e) * avg3d;
03745     float len3d = p_edge_length(e) * avg2d;
03746 
03747     return (len3d == 0.0f) ? 0.0f : len2d / len3d;
03748 }
03749 
03750 static void p_smooth(PChart *chart)
03751 {
03752     PEdge *e;
03753     PVert *v;
03754     PFace *f;
03755     int j, it2, maxiter2, it;
03756     int nedges = chart->nedges, nwheel, gridx, gridy;
03757     int edgesx, edgesy, nsize, esize, i, x, y, maxiter, totiter;
03758     float minv[2], maxv[2], median, invmedian, avglen2d, avglen3d;
03759     float center[2], dx, dy, *nodes, dlimit, d, *oldnodesx, *oldnodesy;
03760     float *nodesx, *nodesy, *hedges, *vedges, climit, moved, padding;
03761     SmoothTriangle *triangles, *t, *t2, **tri, **trip;
03762     SmoothNode *root;
03763     MemArena *arena;
03764 
03765     if (nedges == 0)
03766         return;
03767 
03768     p_chart_uv_bbox(chart, minv, maxv);
03769     median = p_smooth_median_edge_length(chart) * 0.10f;
03770 
03771     if (median == 0.0f)
03772         return;
03773 
03774     invmedian = 1.0f / median;
03775 
03776     /* compute edge distortion */
03777     avglen2d = avglen3d = 0.0;
03778 
03779     for (e = chart->edges; e; e = e->nextlink) {
03780         avglen2d += p_edge_uv_length(e);
03781         avglen3d += p_edge_length(e);
03782     }
03783 
03784     avglen2d /= nedges;
03785     avglen3d /= nedges;
03786 
03787     for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink) {
03788         v->u.distortion = 0.0;
03789         nwheel = 0;
03790 
03791         e = v->edge;
03792         do {
03793             v->u.distortion += p_smooth_distortion(e, avglen2d, avglen3d);
03794             nwheel++;
03795 
03796             e = e->next->next->pair;
03797         } while (e && (e != v->edge));
03798 
03799         v->u.distortion /= nwheel;
03800     }
03801 
03802     /* need to do excessive grid size checking still */
03803     center[0] = 0.5f * (minv[0] + maxv[0]);
03804     center[1] = 0.5f * (minv[1] + maxv[1]);
03805 
03806     dx = 0.5f * (maxv[0] - minv[0]);
03807     dy = 0.5f * (maxv[1] - minv[1]);
03808 
03809     padding = 0.15f;
03810     dx += padding * dx + 2.0f * median;
03811     dy += padding * dy + 2.0f * median;
03812 
03813     gridx = (int)(dx * invmedian);
03814     gridy = (int)(dy * invmedian);
03815 
03816     minv[0] = center[0] - median * gridx;
03817     minv[1] = center[1] - median * gridy;
03818     maxv[0] = center[0] + median * gridx;
03819     maxv[1] = center[1] + median * gridy;
03820 
03821     /* create grid */
03822     gridx = gridx * 2 + 1;
03823     gridy = gridy * 2 + 1;
03824 
03825     if ((gridx <= 2) || (gridy <= 2))
03826         return;
03827     
03828     edgesx = gridx - 1;
03829     edgesy = gridy - 1;
03830     nsize = gridx * gridy;
03831     esize = edgesx * edgesy;
03832 
03833     nodes = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * nsize, "PSmoothNodes");
03834     nodesx = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * nsize, "PSmoothNodesX");
03835     nodesy = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * nsize, "PSmoothNodesY");
03836     oldnodesx = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * nsize, "PSmoothOldNodesX");
03837     oldnodesy = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * nsize, "PSmoothOldNodesY");
03838     hedges = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * esize, "PSmoothHEdges");
03839     vedges = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * esize, "PSmoothVEdges");
03840 
03841     if (!nodes || !nodesx || !nodesy || !oldnodesx || !oldnodesy || !hedges || !vedges) {
03842         if (nodes) MEM_freeN(nodes);
03843         if (nodesx) MEM_freeN(nodesx);
03844         if (nodesy) MEM_freeN(nodesy);
03845         if (oldnodesx) MEM_freeN(oldnodesx);
03846         if (oldnodesy) MEM_freeN(oldnodesy);
03847         if (hedges) MEM_freeN(hedges);
03848         if (vedges) MEM_freeN(vedges);
03849 
03850         // printf("Not enough memory for area smoothing grid");
03851         return;
03852     }
03853 
03854     for (x = 0; x < gridx; x++) {
03855         for (y = 0; y < gridy; y++) {
03856             i = x + y * gridx;
03857 
03858             nodesx[i] = minv[0] + median * x;
03859             nodesy[i] = minv[1] + median * y;
03860 
03861             nodes[i] = 1.0f;
03862         }
03863     }
03864 
03865     /* embed in grid */
03866     for (f = chart->faces; f; f = f->nextlink) {
03867         PEdge *e1 = f->edge, *e2 = e1->next, *e3 = e2->next;
03868         float fmin[2], fmax[2];
03869         int bx1, by1, bx2, by2;
03870 
03871         INIT_MINMAX2(fmin, fmax);
03872 
03873         DO_MINMAX2(e1->vert->uv, fmin, fmax);
03874         DO_MINMAX2(e2->vert->uv, fmin, fmax);
03875         DO_MINMAX2(e3->vert->uv, fmin, fmax);
03876 
03877         bx1 = (int)((fmin[0] - minv[0]) * invmedian);
03878         by1 = (int)((fmin[1] - minv[1]) * invmedian);
03879         bx2 = (int)((fmax[0] - minv[0]) * invmedian + 2);
03880         by2 = (int)((fmax[1] - minv[1]) * invmedian + 2);
03881 
03882         for (x = bx1; x < bx2; x++) {
03883             for (y = by1; y < by2; y++) {
03884                 float p[2], b[3];
03885 
03886                 i = x + y * gridx;
03887         
03888                 p[0] = nodesx[i];
03889                 p[1] = nodesy[i];
03890 
03891                 p_barycentric_2d(e1->vert->uv, e2->vert->uv, e3->vert->uv, p, b);
03892 
03893                 if ((b[0] > 0.0f) && (b[1] > 0.0f) && (b[2] > 0.0f)) {
03894                     nodes[i] = e1->vert->u.distortion * b[0];
03895                     nodes[i] += e2->vert->u.distortion * b[1];
03896                     nodes[i] += e3->vert->u.distortion * b[2];
03897                 }
03898             }
03899         }
03900     }
03901 
03902     /* smooth the grid */
03903     maxiter = 10;
03904     totiter = 0;
03905     climit = 0.00001f * nsize;
03906 
03907     for (it = 0; it < maxiter; it++) {
03908         moved = 0.0f;
03909 
03910         for (x = 0; x < edgesx; x++) {
03911             for (y = 0; y < edgesy; y++) {
03912                 i = x + y * gridx;
03913                 j = x + y * edgesx;
03914 
03915                 hedges[j] = (nodes[i] + nodes[i + 1]) * 0.5f;
03916                 vedges[j] = (nodes[i] + nodes[i + gridx]) * 0.5f;
03917 
03918                 /* we do *inverse* mapping */
03919                 hedges[j] = 1.0f / hedges[j];
03920                 vedges[j] = 1.0f / vedges[j];
03921             }
03922         }
03923 
03924         maxiter2 = 50;
03925         dlimit = 0.0001f;
03926 
03927         for (it2 = 0; it2 < maxiter2; it2++) {
03928             d = 0.0f;
03929             totiter += 1;
03930             
03931             memcpy(oldnodesx, nodesx, sizeof(float) * nsize);
03932             memcpy(oldnodesy, nodesy, sizeof(float) * nsize);
03933 
03934             for (x = 1; x < gridx - 1; x++) {
03935                 for (y = 1; y < gridy - 1; y++) {
03936                     float p[2], oldp[2], sum1, sum2, diff[2], length;
03937 
03938                     i = x + gridx * y;
03939                     j = x + edgesx * y;
03940 
03941                     oldp[0] = oldnodesx[i];
03942                     oldp[1] = oldnodesy[i];
03943 
03944                     sum1 = hedges[j - 1] * oldnodesx[i - 1];
03945                     sum1 += hedges[j] * oldnodesx[i + 1];
03946                     sum1 += vedges[j - edgesx] * oldnodesx[i - gridx];
03947                     sum1 += vedges[j] * oldnodesx[i + gridx];
03948 
03949                     sum2 = hedges[j - 1];
03950                     sum2 += hedges[j];
03951                     sum2 += vedges[j - edgesx];
03952                     sum2 += vedges[j];
03953 
03954                     nodesx[i] = sum1 / sum2;
03955 
03956                     sum1 = hedges[j - 1] * oldnodesy[i - 1];
03957                     sum1 += hedges[j] * oldnodesy[i + 1];
03958                     sum1 += vedges[j - edgesx] * oldnodesy[i - gridx];
03959                     sum1 += vedges[j] * oldnodesy[i + gridx];
03960 
03961                     nodesy[i] = sum1 / sum2;
03962                     
03963                     p[0] = nodesx[i];
03964                     p[1] = nodesy[i];
03965 
03966                     diff[0] = p[0] - oldp[0];
03967                     diff[1] = p[1] - oldp[1];
03968 
03969                     length = sqrt(diff[0] * diff[0] + diff[1] * diff[1]);
03970                     d = MAX2(d, length);
03971                     moved += length;
03972                 }
03973             }
03974 
03975             if (d < dlimit)
03976                 break;
03977         }
03978 
03979         if (moved < climit)
03980             break;
03981     }
03982 
03983     MEM_freeN(oldnodesx);
03984     MEM_freeN(oldnodesy);
03985     MEM_freeN(hedges);
03986     MEM_freeN(vedges);
03987 
03988     /* create bsp */
03989     t = triangles = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(SmoothTriangle) * esize * 2, "PSmoothTris");
03990     trip = tri = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(SmoothTriangle *) * esize * 2, "PSmoothTriP");
03991 
03992     if (!triangles || !tri) {
03993         MEM_freeN(nodes);
03994         MEM_freeN(nodesx);
03995         MEM_freeN(nodesy);
03996 
03997         if (triangles) MEM_freeN(triangles);
03998         if (tri) MEM_freeN(tri);
03999 
04000         // printf("Not enough memory for area smoothing grid");
04001         return;
04002     }
04003 
04004     for (x = 0; x < edgesx; x++) {
04005         for (y = 0; y < edgesy; y++) {
04006             i = x + y * gridx;
04007 
04008             t->co1[0] = nodesx[i];
04009             t->co1[1] = nodesy[i];
04010 
04011             t->co2[0] = nodesx[i + 1];
04012             t->co2[1] = nodesy[i + 1];
04013 
04014             t->co3[0] = nodesx[i + gridx];
04015             t->co3[1] = nodesy[i + gridx];
04016 
04017             t->oco1[0] = minv[0] + x * median;
04018             t->oco1[1] = minv[1] + y * median;
04019 
04020             t->oco2[0] = minv[0] + (x + 1) * median;
04021             t->oco2[1] = minv[1] + y * median;
04022 
04023             t->oco3[0] = minv[0] + x * median;
04024             t->oco3[1] = minv[1] + (y + 1) * median;
04025 
04026             t2 = t + 1;
04027 
04028             t2->co1[0] = nodesx[i + gridx + 1];
04029             t2->co1[1] = nodesy[i + gridx + 1];
04030 
04031             t2->oco1[0] = minv[0] + (x + 1) * median;
04032             t2->oco1[1] = minv[1] + (y + 1) * median;
04033 
04034             t2->co2[0] = t->co2[0]; t2->co2[1] = t->co2[1];
04035             t2->oco2[0] = t->oco2[0]; t2->oco2[1] = t->oco2[1];
04036 
04037             t2->co3[0] = t->co3[0]; t2->co3[1] = t->co3[1];
04038             t2->oco3[0] = t->oco3[0]; t2->oco3[1] = t->oco3[1];
04039 
04040             *trip = t; trip++; t++; 
04041             *trip = t; trip++; t++; 
04042         }
04043     }
04044 
04045     MEM_freeN(nodes);
04046     MEM_freeN(nodesx);
04047     MEM_freeN(nodesy);
04048 
04049     arena = BLI_memarena_new(1 << 16, "param smooth arena");
04050     root = p_node_new(arena, tri, esize * 2, minv, maxv, 0);
04051 
04052     for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink)
04053         if (!p_node_intersect(root, v->uv))
04054             param_warning("area smoothing error: couldn't find mapping triangle\n");
04055 
04056     p_node_delete(root);
04057     BLI_memarena_free(arena);
04058     
04059     MEM_freeN(triangles);
04060 }
04061 
04062 /* Exported */
04063 
04064 ParamHandle *param_construct_begin(void)
04065 {
04066     PHandle *handle = MEM_callocN(sizeof *handle, "PHandle");
04067     handle->construction_chart = p_chart_new(handle);
04068     handle->state = PHANDLE_STATE_ALLOCATED;
04069     handle->arena = BLI_memarena_new((1 << 16), "param construct arena");
04070     handle->aspx = 1.0f;
04071     handle->aspy = 1.0f;
04072 
04073     handle->hash_verts = phash_new((PHashLink **)&handle->construction_chart->verts, 1);
04074     handle->hash_edges = phash_new((PHashLink **)&handle->construction_chart->edges, 1);
04075     handle->hash_faces = phash_new((PHashLink **)&handle->construction_chart->faces, 1);
04076 
04077     return (ParamHandle *)handle;
04078 }
04079 
04080 void param_aspect_ratio(ParamHandle *handle, float aspx, float aspy)
04081 {
04082     PHandle *phandle = (PHandle *)handle;
04083 
04084     phandle->aspx = aspx;
04085     phandle->aspy = aspy;
04086 }
04087 
04088 void param_delete(ParamHandle *handle)
04089 {
04090     PHandle *phandle = (PHandle *)handle;
04091     int i;
04092 
04093     param_assert((phandle->state == PHANDLE_STATE_ALLOCATED) ||
04094                  (phandle->state == PHANDLE_STATE_CONSTRUCTED));
04095 
04096     for (i = 0; i < phandle->ncharts; i++)
04097         p_chart_delete(phandle->charts[i]);
04098     
04099     if (phandle->charts)
04100         MEM_freeN(phandle->charts);
04101 
04102     if (phandle->construction_chart) {
04103         p_chart_delete(phandle->construction_chart);
04104 
04105         phash_delete(phandle->hash_verts);
04106         phash_delete(phandle->hash_edges);
04107         phash_delete(phandle->hash_faces);
04108     }
04109 
04110     BLI_memarena_free(phandle->arena);
04111     MEM_freeN(phandle);
04112 }
04113 
04114 void param_face_add(ParamHandle *handle, ParamKey key, int nverts,
04115                     ParamKey *vkeys, float **co, float **uv,
04116                     ParamBool *pin, ParamBool *select)
04117 {
04118     PHandle *phandle = (PHandle *)handle;
04119 
04120     param_assert(phash_lookup(phandle->hash_faces, key) == NULL);
04121     param_assert(phandle->state == PHANDLE_STATE_ALLOCATED);
04122     param_assert((nverts == 3) || (nverts == 4));
04123 
04124     if (nverts == 4) {
04125         if (p_quad_split_direction(phandle, co, vkeys)) {
04126             p_face_add_construct(phandle, key, vkeys, co, uv, 0, 1, 2, pin, select);
04127             p_face_add_construct(phandle, key, vkeys, co, uv, 0, 2, 3, pin, select);
04128         }
04129         else {
04130             p_face_add_construct(phandle, key, vkeys, co, uv, 0, 1, 3, pin, select);
04131             p_face_add_construct(phandle, key, vkeys, co, uv, 1, 2, 3, pin, select);
04132         }
04133     }
04134     else if (!p_face_exists(phandle, vkeys, 0, 1, 2)) {
04135         p_face_add_construct(phandle, key, vkeys, co, uv, 0, 1, 2, pin, select);
04136     }
04137 }
04138 
04139 void param_edge_set_seam(ParamHandle *handle, ParamKey *vkeys)
04140 {
04141     PHandle *phandle = (PHandle *)handle;
04142     PEdge *e;
04143 
04144     param_assert(phandle->state == PHANDLE_STATE_ALLOCATED);
04145 
04146     e = p_edge_lookup(phandle, vkeys);
04147     if (e)
04148         e->flag |= PEDGE_SEAM;
04149 }
04150 
04151 void param_construct_end(ParamHandle *handle, ParamBool fill, ParamBool impl)
04152 {
04153     PHandle *phandle = (PHandle *)handle;
04154     PChart *chart = phandle->construction_chart;
04155     int i, j, nboundaries = 0;
04156     PEdge *outer;
04157 
04158     param_assert(phandle->state == PHANDLE_STATE_ALLOCATED);
04159 
04160     phandle->ncharts = p_connect_pairs(phandle, (PBool)impl);
04161     phandle->charts = p_split_charts(phandle, chart, phandle->ncharts);
04162 
04163     p_chart_delete(phandle->construction_chart);
04164     phandle->construction_chart = NULL;
04165 
04166     phash_delete(phandle->hash_verts);
04167     phash_delete(phandle->hash_edges);
04168     phash_delete(phandle->hash_faces);
04169     phandle->hash_verts = phandle->hash_edges = phandle->hash_faces = NULL;
04170 
04171     for (i = j = 0; i < phandle->ncharts; i++) {
04172         PVert *v;
04173         chart = phandle->charts[i];
04174 
04175         p_chart_boundaries(chart, &nboundaries, &outer);
04176 
04177         if (!impl && nboundaries == 0) {
04178             p_chart_delete(chart);
04179             continue;
04180         }
04181 
04182         phandle->charts[j] = chart;
04183         j++;
04184 
04185         if (fill && (nboundaries > 1))
04186             p_chart_fill_boundaries(chart, outer);
04187 
04188         for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink)
04189             p_vert_load_pin_select_uvs(handle, v);
04190     }
04191 
04192     phandle->ncharts = j;
04193 
04194     phandle->state = PHANDLE_STATE_CONSTRUCTED;
04195 }
04196 
04197 void param_lscm_begin(ParamHandle *handle, ParamBool live, ParamBool abf)
04198 {
04199     PHandle *phandle = (PHandle *)handle;
04200     PFace *f;
04201     int i;
04202 
04203     param_assert(phandle->state == PHANDLE_STATE_CONSTRUCTED);
04204     phandle->state = PHANDLE_STATE_LSCM;
04205 
04206     for (i = 0; i < phandle->ncharts; i++) {
04207         for (f = phandle->charts[i]->faces; f; f = f->nextlink)
04208             p_face_backup_uvs(f);
04209         p_chart_lscm_begin(phandle->charts[i], (PBool)live, (PBool)abf);
04210     }
04211 }
04212 
04213 void param_lscm_solve(ParamHandle *handle)
04214 {
04215     PHandle *phandle = (PHandle *)handle;
04216     PChart *chart;
04217     int i;
04218     PBool result;
04219 
04220     param_assert(phandle->state == PHANDLE_STATE_LSCM);
04221 
04222     for (i = 0; i < phandle->ncharts; i++) {
04223         chart = phandle->charts[i];
04224 
04225         if (chart->u.lscm.context) {
04226             result = p_chart_lscm_solve(phandle, chart);
04227 
04228             if (result && !(chart->flag & PCHART_NOPACK))
04229                 p_chart_rotate_minimum_area(chart);
04230 
04231             if (!result || (chart->u.lscm.pin1))
04232                 p_chart_lscm_end(chart);
04233         }
04234     }
04235 }
04236 
04237 void param_lscm_end(ParamHandle *handle)
04238 {
04239     PHandle *phandle = (PHandle *)handle;
04240     int i;
04241 
04242     param_assert(phandle->state == PHANDLE_STATE_LSCM);
04243 
04244     for (i = 0; i < phandle->ncharts; i++) {
04245         p_chart_lscm_end(phandle->charts[i]);
04246 #if 0
04247         p_chart_complexify(phandle->charts[i]);
04248 #endif
04249     }
04250 
04251     phandle->state = PHANDLE_STATE_CONSTRUCTED;
04252 }

04254 void param_stretch_begin(ParamHandle *handle)
04255 {
04256     PHandle *phandle = (PHandle *)handle;
04257     PChart *chart;
04258     PVert *v;
04259     PFace *f;
04260     int i;
04261 
04262     param_assert(phandle->state == PHANDLE_STATE_CONSTRUCTED);
04263     phandle->state = PHANDLE_STATE_STRETCH;
04264 
04265     phandle->rng = rng_new(31415926);
04266     phandle->blend = 0.0f;
04267 
04268     for (i = 0; i < phandle->ncharts; i++) {
04269         chart = phandle->charts[i];
04270 
04271         for (v = chart->verts; v; v = v->nextlink)
04272             v->flag &= ~PVERT_PIN;  /* don't use user-defined pins */
04273 
04274         p_stretch_pin_boundary(chart);
04275 
04276         for (f = chart->faces; f; f = f->nextlink) {
04277             p_face_backup_uvs(f);
04278             f->u.area3d = p_face_area(f);
04279         }
04280     }
04281 }
04282

04286 
04287     param_assert(phandle->state == PHANDLE_STATE_STRETCH);
04288     phandle->blend = blend;
04289 }

04311

04313     phandle->rng = NULL;
04314 }

04316 void param_smooth_area(ParamHandle *handle)
04317 {
04318     PHandle *phandle = (PHandle *)handle;
04319     int i;
04320 
04321     param_assert(phandle->state == PHANDLE_STATE_CONSTRUCTED);
04322

04324         PChart *chart = phandle->charts[i];
04325         PVert *v;
04326

04328             v->flag &= ~PVERT_PIN;
04329 
04330         p_smooth(chart);
04331     }
04332 }
04333  
04334 void param_pack(ParamHandle *handle, float margin)
04335 {   
04336     /* box packing variables */
04337     boxPack *boxarray, *box;
04338     float tot_width, tot_height, scale;
04339      
04340     PChart *chart;
04341     int i, unpacked = 0;
04342     float trans[2];
04343     double area = 0.0;
04344     
04345     PHandle *phandle = (PHandle *)handle;
04346     
04347     if (phandle->ncharts == 0)
04348         return;
04349     
04350     if (phandle->aspx != phandle->aspy)
04351         param_scale(handle, 1.0f / phandle->aspx, 1.0f / phandle->aspy);
04352     
04353     /* we may not use all these boxes */
04354     boxarray = MEM_mallocN(phandle->ncharts * sizeof(boxPack), "boxPack box");
04355     
04356     
04357     for (i = 0; i < phandle->ncharts; i++) {
04358         chart = phandle->charts[i];
04359         
04360         if (chart->flag & PCHART_NOPACK) {
04361             unpacked++;
04362             continue;
04363         }
04364         
04365         box = boxarray + (i - unpacked);
04366         
04367         p_chart_uv_bbox(chart, trans, chart->u.pack.size);
04368         
04369         trans[0] = -trans[0];
04370         trans[1] = -trans[1];
04371         
04372         p_chart_uv_translate(chart, trans);
04373         
04374         box->w =  chart->u.pack.size[0] + trans[0];
04375         box->h =  chart->u.pack.size[1] + trans[1];
04376         box->index = i; /* warning this index skips PCHART_NOPACK boxes */
04377         
04378         if (margin > 0.0f)
04379             area += sqrt(box->w * box->h);
04380     }   
04381     
04382     if (margin > 0.0f) {
04383         /* multiply the margin by the area to give predictable results not dependent on UV scale,
04384          * ...Without using the area running pack multiple times also gives a bad feedback loop.
04385          * multiply by 0.1 so the margin value from the UI can be from 0.0 to 1.0 but not give a massive margin */
04386         margin = (margin * (float)area) * 0.1f;
04387         unpacked = 0;
04388         for (i = 0; i < phandle->ncharts; i++) {
04389             chart = phandle->charts[i];
04390             
04391             if (chart->flag & PCHART_NOPACK) {
04392                 unpacked++;
04393                 continue;
04394             }
04395             
04396             box = boxarray + (i - unpacked);
04397             trans[0] = margin;
04398             trans[1] = margin;
04399             p_chart_uv_translate(chart, trans);
04400             box->w += margin * 2;
04401             box->h += margin * 2;
04402         }
04403     }
04404     
04405     boxPack2D(boxarray, phandle->ncharts - unpacked, &tot_width, &tot_height);
04406     
04407     if (tot_height > tot_width)
04408         scale = 1.0f / tot_height;
04409     else
04410         scale = 1.0f / tot_width;
04411     
04412     for (i = 0; i < phandle->ncharts - unpacked; i++) {
04413         box = boxarray + i;
04414         trans[0] = box->x;
04415         trans[1] = box->y;
04416         
04417         chart = phandle->charts[box->index];
04418         p_chart_uv_translate(chart, trans);
04419         p_chart_uv_scale(chart, scale);
04420     }
04421     MEM_freeN(boxarray);
04422 
04423     if (phandle->aspx != phandle->aspy)
04424         param_scale(handle, phandle->aspx, phandle->aspy);
04425 }
04426 
04427 void param_average(ParamHandle *handle)
04428 {
04429     PChart *chart;
04430     int i;
04431     float tot_uvarea = 0.0f, tot_facearea = 0.0f;
04432     float tot_fac, fac;
04433     float minv[2], maxv[2], trans[2];
04434     PHandle *phandle = (PHandle *)handle;
04435     
04436     if (phandle->ncharts == 0)
04437         return;
04438     
04439     for (i = 0; i < phandle->ncharts; i++) {
04440         PFace *f;
04441         chart = phandle->charts[i];
04442         
04443         chart->u.pack.area = 0.0f; /* 3d area */
04444         chart->u.pack.rescale = 0.0f; /* UV area, abusing rescale for tmp storage, oh well :/ */
04445         
04446         for (f = chart->faces; f; f = f->nextlink) {
04447             chart->u.pack.area += p_face_area(f);
04448             chart->u.pack.rescale += fabsf(p_face_uv_area_signed(f));
04449         }
04450         
04451         tot_facearea += chart->u.pack.area;
04452         tot_uvarea += chart->u.pack.rescale;
04453     }
04454     
04455     if (tot_facearea == tot_uvarea || tot_facearea == 0.0f || tot_uvarea == 0.0f) {
04456         /* nothing to do */
04457         return;
04458     }
04459     
04460     tot_fac = tot_facearea / tot_uvarea;
04461     
04462     for (i = 0; i < phandle->ncharts; i++) {
04463         chart = phandle->charts[i];
04464         if (chart->u.pack.area != 0.0f && chart->u.pack.rescale != 0.0f) {
04465             fac = chart->u.pack.area / chart->u.pack.rescale;
04466             
04467             /* Get the island center */
04468             p_chart_uv_bbox(chart, minv, maxv);
04469             trans[0] = (minv[0] + maxv[0]) / -2.0f;
04470             trans[1] = (minv[1] + maxv[1]) / -2.0f;
04471             
04472             /* Move center to 0,0 */
04473             p_chart_uv_translate(chart, trans);
04474             p_chart_uv_scale(chart, sqrt(fac / tot_fac));
04475             
04476             /* Move to original center */
04477             trans[0] = -trans[0];
04478             trans[1] = -trans[1];
04479             p_chart_uv_translate(chart, trans);
04480         }
04481     }
04482 }
04483 
04484 void param_scale(ParamHandle *handle, float x, float y)
04485 {
04486     PHandle *phandle = (PHandle *)handle;
04487     PChart *chart;
04488     int i;
04489 
04490     for (i = 0; i < phandle->ncharts; i++) {
04491         chart = phandle->charts[i];
04492         p_chart_uv_scale_xy(chart, x, y);
04493     }
04494 }
04495 
04496 void param_flush(ParamHandle *handle)
04497 {
04498     PHandle *phandle = (PHandle *)handle;
04499     PChart *chart;
04500     int i;
04501 
04502     for (i = 0; i < phandle->ncharts; i++) {
04503         chart = phandle->charts[i];
04504 
04505         if ((phandle->state == PHANDLE_STATE_LSCM) && !chart->u.lscm.context)
04506             continue;
04507 
04508         if (phandle->blend == 0.0f)
04509             p_flush_uvs(phandle, chart);
04510         else
04511             p_flush_uvs_blend(phandle, chart, phandle->blend);
04512     }
04513 }
04514 
04515 void param_flush_restore(ParamHandle *handle)
04516 {
04517     PHandle *phandle = (PHandle *)handle;
04518     PChart *chart;
04519     PFace *f;
04520     int i;
04521 
04522     for (i = 0; i < phandle->ncharts; i++) {
04523         chart = phandle->charts[i];
04524 
04525         for (f = chart->faces; f; f = f->nextlink)
04526             p_face_restore_uvs(f);
04527     }
04528 }
